products.name: Hop on Hop off Bus - Tamborine Mountain - From Brisbane
products.shortDescription: Embark on an adventure from Brisbane to the enchanting heights of Tamborine Mountain with our exclusive hop-on, hop-off bus service. Departing every morning from Brisbane. Enjoy the flexibility to explore Tamborine Mountain.
products.description:
Tamborine Mountain Hop on Hop Off Bus


TAMBORINE MOUNTAIN MAP


Pickup Locations and Timetable

Brisbane
8:30am Pickup from City
4:00pm Departure for 5pm return


Embark on a daily adventure from the heart of Brisbane to the enchanting heights of Tamborine Mountain with our exclusive hop-on, hop-off bus service. With no public bus routes to this picturesque locale, our service offers a unique opportunity to explore the lush landscapes and breathtaking views of Tamborine Mountain at your own pace. Departing every morning from Brisbane, our comfortable buses provide a direct link to the natural beauty and serene environment of one of Queensland's most treasured destinations. Enjoy the flexibility to explore the mountain's famous wineries, artisanal shops, and stunning walking trails before hopping back on the bus to return to the city. This service is your gateway to experiencing the tranquility of Tamborine Mountain, making it an unmissable adventure for both locals and visitors alike.


Nature Based Tourism, Lookouts, local attractions

  1. Tamborine Mountain Skywalk
  2. Tamborine Mountain Coffee Plantation
  3. Tamborine Mountain Botanic Gardens
  4. Gallery Walk Shopping Precinct
  5. St Bernards Hotel - Booking Recommended
  6. Jasmine Organics
  7. Robert Sowter Park - (Lookout)
  8. Rotary Lookout
  9. Visitor Information Centre
  10. Tamborine Mountain Cheese
  11. Curtis Falls Walking track
  12. Cedar Creek Falls
  13. Witches Falls Walking Trail
  14. Tamborine National Park
  15. Witches Falls Circuit
  16. Thunderbird Park
  17. Palm Grove Section


Wineries, Breweries, Distilleries

  1. Cedar Creek Estate Vineyard & Winery
  2. Hampton Estate Wines - Booking with Venue Required
  3. Castle Glen Australia
  4. Cauldron Distillery
  5. Fortitude Brewing Company
  6. Witches Falls Winery
  7. Tamborine Mountain Distillery
  8. Tamborine Mountain Coffee Plantation

Each of these attractions offers a unique experience, from tasting locally produced wines and spirits to exploring the natural beauty and artistic culture of Tamborine Mountain.

Return to Gold Coast and Brisbane

Depart Mountain 4:00pm

Arrive Brisbane 5:00pm


Gold Coast and Brisbane Shuttles will join this service and you will have an unlimited hop on hop off pass for the day.


Please look at your itinerary and plan which venues you would like to see and let the driver know so they can mark it off on our pickup list for the day.


*This ticket is for hop on hop off shuttle transfers only and doesn’t include entry to an attractions

products.name: 3 Day Luxury Brisbane - Gold Coast - Bryon Bay Experience
products.shortDescription: A Private 3 Day tour of the Brisbane, The Gold Coast and Byron Bay and taste some of the areas best local produce, with a gourmet food, sightseeing and history along the way, this tour is personalised to suit your group.
products.description:
This is an all inclusive tour that includes and of your food, drinks, tastings and entry fees for the day, no expense is spared while we take you on an adventure through the Scenic Rim.

Day 1: Brisbane and Surrounds

Late Morning:

Depart from your luxury accommodation and head towards Mt Cootha
Stop at Mt Cootha for panoramic views of the surrounding city and coastline
Enjoy a picnic lunch at one of the designated areas within the region.

Afternoon:

Proceed to the the second largest Camel Farm in the World
Explore Summer Land Camels at your own pace, then proceed to a guided tour of the farm
After the tour we will get a guided tasting of all of the camel products such as milk and cheese - (lactose free)

Evening:

Return to your luxury accommodation and indulge in a gourmet dinner prepared by a renowned chef.
Relax and unwind, taking in the tranquility of the surrounding nature.

Recommended Accomodation: Brisbane Marriott or Spicers Balfour

Day 2: Gold Coast Hinterland

Morning:

Depart from your accommodation and drive towards the Gold Coast Hinterland
Start your day with a leisurely hike or let our guide drive you to see the best lookouts while traveling through lush rainforest.
Capture panoramic views of the surrounding landscape from the Gold Coast Hinterland.

Afternoon:

Drive to Beechmont, a charming village nestled in the mountains.
Visit the Beechmont Markets (held on certain days), where you can browse and purchase locally made arts, crafts, and gourmet produce.
Enjoy a delicious lunch at one of the cozy cafes or restaurants in the area.

Evening:

Return to your luxury accommodation and take advantage of the facilities, such as a spa or wellness center.
Treat yourself to a rejuvenating massage or a dip in the pool.
Savor a gourmet dinner accompanied by fine wines from the region.

Recommended Accomodation: Spicers Hidden Vale, JW Marriott, The Langham or Pethers Rainforest Retreat

Day 3: Byron Bay

Morning:

Depart from your accommodation and head through the tweed Volcano to Byron Bay.
Explore Byron Town and See all sorts of Wildlife at the Cape Byron Lighthouse - Australia's most easterly point.
Take a guided bird-watching tour to spot some of the region’s diverse marine wildlife.

Afternoon:

Drive past the houses of the rich and famous on our way to a gourmet lunch, known for its picturesque landscapes and farm to table Cuisine.
Visit a local macadamia farm or a gin distillery along the way we can drop in for a tasting or book a rainforest tour.
Explore the Beaches and Shops, a vibrant arts and crafts precinct featuring boutique shops, galleries, and cafes.

Evening:

Return to the Gold Coast via a Scenic Route through more national parks and see the ancient rainforests and natural beauty of the area.
Reflect on the past few days of luxury and natural beauty.
Return to your accommodation and spend a relaxing evening, perhaps stargazing or enjoying a nightcap.
Please note that it’s always a good idea to check the latest information and opening hours for the attractions and activities mentioned, as they may vary.

We like to personalise these experiences to suit your group so if you haven't already please chat to our team and let them know if there is anything that you'd really like to see or do along the way and we can include this in your itinerary 

Your tour includes:

  • Unique Experience
  • Gourmet Food
  • All Inclusive
  • Private Tour Guide
  • Best Food and Produce in the Region
  • Gourmet Food
  • only the best scenery
  • Luxury SUV
  • Door to door service*

Recommended Accomodation: You can stay anywhere but these places are quite nice

Prior to Day 1 - Brisbane Marriott or Emporium Southbank or Spicers Balfour

Day 2  - Spicers Hidden Vale or Pethers Rainforest Retreat
Day 3 - The Langham Gold Coast or Palazzo Versace


Please call us on 0466331232 or email us at bookings@pineappletours.com.au to confirm availability before booking.

products.name: 3 Day Luxury Hinterland Experience
products.shortDescription: A Private 3 Day tour of the Gold Coast and Scenic Rim and taste some of Queensland's best produce, with a gourmet food, sightseeing and history along the way, this tour is personalised to suit your group.
products.description:
This is an all inclusive tour that includes and of your food, drinks, tastings and entry fees for the day, no expense is spared while we take you on an adventure through the Scenic Rim.

Day 1: Springbrook and Natural Bridge

Late Morning:

Depart from your luxury accommodation and head towards Springbrook
Stop by the Best of All Lookout for panoramic views of the surrounding rainforest and coastline.
Visit Purling Brook Falls, a stunning waterfall with walking tracks that offer breathtaking views.
Enjoy a picnic lunch at one of the designated areas within the region.

Afternoon:

Proceed to the Natural Bridge section of Springbrook National Park.
Explore the Natural Bridge Circuit at your own pace, a picturesque walk that leads you to a stunning rock arch formation.
Take a walk through the glow-worm caves at nightfall to witness the magical glow-worms illuminating the cave.

Evening:

Return to your luxury accommodation and indulge in a gourmet dinner prepared by a renowned chef.
Relax and unwind, taking in the tranquility of the surrounding nature.

Recommended Accomodation: Beechmont Estate

Day 2: Binna Burra and Beechmont

Morning:

Depart from your accommodation and drive towards Binna Burra.
Start your day with a leisurely hike on the Bellbird Circuit, a scenic track that winds through lush rainforest and offers bird-watching opportunities.
Capture panoramic views of the surrounding landscape from the Binna Burra Mountain Lodge lookout.

Afternoon:

Drive to Beechmont, a charming village nestled in the mountains.
Visit the Beechmont Markets (held on certain days), where you can browse and purchase locally made arts, crafts, and gourmet produce.
Enjoy a delicious lunch at one of the cozy cafes or restaurants in the area.

Evening:

Return to your luxury accommodation and take advantage of the facilities, such as a spa or wellness center.
Treat yourself to a rejuvenating massage or a dip in the pool.
Savor a gourmet dinner accompanied by fine wines from the region.

Day 3: Lamington and the Scenic Rim

Morning:

Depart from your accommodation and head to Lamington.
Explore the O’Reilly’s Tree Top Walk, a suspended bridge that offers a unique perspective of the rainforest canopy.
Take a guided bird-watching tour to spot some of the region’s diverse bird species.

Afternoon:

Drive to the Scenic Rim region, known for its picturesque landscapes and charming towns.
Visit Tamborine Mountain and indulge in wine tasting at one of the local wineries.
Explore the Gallery Walk, a vibrant arts and crafts precinct featuring boutique shops, galleries, and cafes.

Evening:

Enjoy a sunset dinner at one of the acclaimed restaurants in the Scenic Rim.
Reflect on the past few days of luxury and natural beauty.
Return to your accommodation and spend a relaxing evening, perhaps stargazing or enjoying a nightcap.
Please note that it’s always a good idea to check the latest information and opening hours for the attractions and activities mentioned, as they may vary.

products.description:
A Taste of Gourmet Tasting Experience Includes


- All Inclusive Bespoke Experience designed just for your group
– Guided Tastings at Local Providores in the region

- A Guided Tour of a Distillery, brewery or winery - your choice (we can replace this with another activity for non drinkers)

- Gourmet tastings as we travel through the region

- Food Pairings

– Gourmet Breakfast, Lunch or Dinner - Your Choice

– Scenic Lookouts along the way

- This tour is personalised to suit your group

- All dietary requirements are catered for.

3-4Hrs

Venues we visit*

We will choose a selection of the best venues around the area that we are visiting and this tour is personalised to suit your group.



- Departs: Brisbane, Gold Coast, Scenic Rim, Tamborine Mountain and surrounds 

- SUV is for small groups and Luxury Bus for larger Groups

Please call us on 0466331232 or email us at bookings@pineappletours.com.au to confirm availability before booking.

Private Hire Only 


Stretching inland from through the Tropical Rainforest of Southeast QLD, the Hinterland is filled with gorgeous villages, stunning scenery and a tranquillity that washes urban stresses from every visitor. Taste Local Produce along the way.


We've designed the perfect quick trip just for you, this tour is not only for the discerning traveller but also for locals that just need a short break and with us a morning or an afternoon is all you need to truly wind down and relax.
Our goal is not just to provide an excellent tour experience but we want you to feel that you are being shown around by a family member or a friend of the family.
Each and every experience will be completely personalised to suit your needs and can be adjusted as needed throughout the day and all of our vehicles are new and air conditioned.

Please tell us what kind of food you like and if you prefer wineries, breweries or distilleries, or if you don't drink this can be more of an adventure tour too.

This tour is personalised by our team and they will reach out to you once you've booked to confirm your preferred itinerary on the day.

products.shortDescription:
Choose one way if you would like to Stay in Tamborine Mountain or Unlimited Hop on Hop off with Return Ticket

*Unlimited Hop on Hop off Option includes all transport around Tamborine Mountain for one day
products.description:
Tamborine Mountain - Shuttle

*Unlimited Hop on Hop off Option includes all transport around Tamborine Mountain for one day


Pickup Locations and Timetable

Brisbane
8:30am pickup from City
3:30pm Departure for 5pm return

Hop on Hop off - Tamborine

 

Create Your Own Adventure: Tamborine Mountain Hop on Hop off Bus

Experience the beauty and charm of Tamborine Mountain with our flexible Hop on Hop off Bus service. Operating daily, this convenient transportation option allows you unlimited access to the mountain’s top attractions. Whether you’re a nature lover, foodie, or adventure seeker, tailor your day to suit your interests.


How It Works

•Unlimited Access: Hop on and off as many times as you like throughout the day.

•Convenient Pickups: Start your journey from various Brisbane locations.

•Flexible Scheduling: Spend as much time as you want at each stop. Catch the next bus when you’re ready to move on.

 

Featured Attractions - Please look at the Map in the image Gallery to see all attractions.

 

 

Tamborine Rainforest Skywalk

Walk Among the Treetops

Experience the rainforest like never before on the Tamborine Rainforest Skywalk. This eco-adventure takes you on a 1.5 km walk through the beautiful middle and upper canopies of the rainforest.

•Highlights: Skywalk bridge, cantilever bridge, Cedar Creek viewing platform

•Ideal For: Nature enthusiasts, families, photographers

 

Glow Worm Caves Tamborine Mountain

A Magical Underground Experience

Visit the Glow Worm Caves at Cedar Creek Estate and witness thousands of glowing creatures lighting up the darkness in a purpose-built cave.

•Highlights: Guided tours, glow worm viewing, Cedar Creek Estate Winery

•Ideal For: Families, nature lovers, educational trips

 

Gallery Walk Tamborine Mountain

Shopping and Dining Haven

Stroll down Gallery Walk, Tamborine Mountain’s famous strip of boutiques, art galleries, cafés, and speciality shops offering everything from local arts to delicious fudge.

•Highlights: Shopping, art galleries, dining options

•Ideal For: Shoppers, art enthusiasts, foodies

 

Witches Falls Winery

Sip Award-Winning Wines

Enjoy wine tastings at Queensland’s oldest continuously operating winery. Relax in the cellar door or picnic among the vineyards.

•Highlights: Wine tasting, cheese platters, vineyard views

•Ideal For: Wine lovers, couples, groups

 

Cedar Creek Estate Vineyard & Winery

Wine, Art, and More

Visit Cedar Creek Estate for wine tasting, stroll through the art gallery, or enjoy a meal at the restaurant overlooking the lake.

•Highlights: Wine tasting, restaurant, art gallery, Glow Worm Caves

•Ideal For: Wine enthusiasts, families, art lovers

 

Tamborine Mountain Distillery

Award-Winning Spirits

Discover handcrafted liqueurs and spirits at Australia’s most internationally awarded distillery. Taste unique flavours and learn about the distilling process.

•Highlights: Spirit and liqueur tastings, distillery tours, gift shop

•Ideal For: Spirit connoisseurs, adults, those interested in craft distilling

 

Tamborine Mountain Glades - Previously Thunderbird Park

Adventure in Nature

Experience a range of activities including high ropes courses at the TreeTop Challenge, laser skirmish, mini-golf, and gemstone fossicking.

•Highlights: Adventure activities, camping, horse riding

•Ideal For: Families, adventure seekers, groups

 

Curtis Falls

Serene Waterfall Walk

Take a tranquil walk through lush rainforest to the beautiful Curtis Falls. Enjoy the sights and sounds of nature along the way.

•Highlights: Rainforest walk, waterfall viewing, birdwatching

•Ideal For: Nature lovers, photographers, hikers

 

Fortitude Brewing Company

Craft Beers and Good Times

Relax with a cold craft beer at the local brewery. Enjoy a variety of brews in a friendly atmosphere.

•Highlights: Craft beer tastings, live music events

•Ideal For: Beer enthusiasts, groups, casual dining

 

Tamborine Mountain Botanic Gardens

Flora Paradise

Explore 11 hectares of beautiful gardens showcasing both native and exotic plants. Perfect for a peaceful stroll or a picnic.

•Highlights: Themed gardens, lake, picnic areas

•Ideal For: Garden enthusiasts, families, relaxation

Why Choose Our Hop on Hop off Bus?

•Customise Your Day: Create an itinerary that matches your interests.

•Comfort and Convenience: Avoid the hassle of driving and parking.

•Local Insights: Friendly drivers provide tips and local knowledge.

 

Booking Information

•Operating Days: Daily

•Pick-Up Locations: Various points across Brisbane

•Tickets: Purchase online or at select outlets


Embark on a journey tailored by you. From breathtaking natural sights to culinary delights and thrilling adventures, the Tamborine Mountain Hop on Hop off Bus is your key to an unforgettable day. Book your ticket today and start exploring!

products.name: Byron Bay Day Tour - Signature Experience
products.shortDescription: Stretching inland from Australia's most easterly point, Byron Bay's hinterland is filled with gorgeous villages, stunning scenery and a tranquillity that washes urban stresses from every visitor.
products.description:
Please call us on 0466331232 or email us at bookings@pineappletours.com.au to confirm availability before booking.

Stretching inland from Australia's most easterly point, Byron Bay's hinterland is filled with gorgeous villages, stunning scenery and a tranquillity that washes urban stresses from every visitor. The rolling hills are home to countless examples of breathtaking nature and villages worth falling in love with.

Byron Bay Slow and Low Tour Includes:

- Pickup and Drop off from your home/hotel or Airbnb

- Gourmet Lunch, Complimentary Beverage with lunch - All Dietary needs can be catered for.

- Personalised Experience

- Tour through the Villages and arts and culture of the Byron Hinterland

- Sightseeing - Byron Bay Township, Cape Byron Lighthouse, Byron Hinterland

- Short Scenic Walks - Optional



We've designed the perfect day just for you, this tour is not only for the discerning traveller but also for locals that just need a short break and with us one day is all you need to truly wind down and relax.
Our goal is not just to provide an excellent tour experience but we want you to feel that you are being shown around by a family member or a friend of the family.
Each and every experience will be completely personalised to suit your needs and can be adjusted as needed throughout the day and all of our vehicles are new and air conditioned.

Byron Bay is a 1-1.5Hr drive from the Gold Coast depending on which hotel you are staying and it has beautiful scenery of rolling green hills and valleys carved from a dormant volcano.

To start we can do a bit of sightseeing on the way to Byron Bay, choose from a quick trip down the highway and get straight into the bustling town of Byron Bay or we can take the backroads everywhere and stop in the small towns of Murwillumbah, Mullumbimby and Bungalow for some street side shopping and coffee along the way.

After this go for a cruise over to Wategos Beach and Cape Byron Lighthouse, this is the most easterly point of Australia and the shades of blue that you see here a like no other place in the world. There are regularly dolphins, Seals and also Whales can be seen from the cliffs in Whale Season*. Here there is also a short 15 min Scenic walk from Cape Byron Lighthouse to Wategos Beach and you are welcome to walk down and we can pick you up at the bottom.

What is the perfect day out without the perfect lunch? We have gone to great efforts to find you the best food experiences that money can buy we can give you a few options to choose from on the day or let us surprise you with the best of the best culinary delights.

After lunch, if you prefer the beach we will head down to one of the many secluded beaches that span the shores of the candescent blue coastline, otherwise if you prefer we can head to one of the most fantastic day spas where you can experience hot and cold plunge pools, steam rooms, Saunas.

Now it's the afternoon and if you would like we can sample a selection of locally owned/made beers at either Stone and Wood Brewery or Byron Bay Brewing Co otherwise if you prefer something stronger there are also several Distilleries in Byron Bay that we can visit including Cape Byron Distillery and Husk Distillers - Famous for their Ink Gin and agricole Rum.

On the way home if you would like to take a scenic route and visit some more special beaches on the way home we will be more than happy to oblige. Feel free to ask us about our dinner recommendations once we get back to the Gold Coast because what would the perfect day out be without the perfect dinner?


*Whale Watching Season will be from late May to early November and will bring over 20,000 Humpback Whales past the spectacular coastline of Byron Bay and right beside the Gold Coast beaches. The Whales migrate north from Antarctica into the warm waters of North Queensland in the early months and return with calves in the later months.


This tour is personalised by our team and they will reach out to you once you've booked to confirm your preferred itinerary on the day.

Please call us on 0466331232 or email us at bookings@pineappletours.com.au to confirm availability before booking.

products.name: Candice's Rainforest experience 1Hr Tour
products.shortDescription: The most successful people follow their passions and not their pay checks and Candice has definitely found her passion. Meet us for a surprising experience of the Hinterlands subtropical rainforest. Choose from Daytime or evening tour
products.description:
RAINFOREST TOUR INCLUDES


- Spot rare native animals in the wild

- Experience Candice's passion about the rainforest

- Daytime and Evening Options

- Suitable to all fitness levels

- Scenic Lookouts along the way

- Run with sustainability in mind 

- Eco Friendly

- Central Pickup locations in Tamborine Mountain, Surfers Paradise, Broadbeach and Southport (Optional Extra - Choose in checkout)

- Gourmet Two Course Lunch or Dinner can be added as an option during checkout.


Rainforest covers only 2% of the Earth’s surface and only 1% of Australia’s land
mass yet 50% of Earth’s plants and animals can only be found in rainforests.
And of the Gold Coast’s wildlife, you can find over 60% of all plant life and over 80%
of all animals on Tamborine Mountain.
Don’t miss out on witnessing all the creatures that make this a ‘hot spot’ for species
diversity.


Daytime Tour


Venture by day and let’s test our luck spotting the critically endangered, Albert’s
Lyrebird, only found in the Scenic Rim area and listen to it’s incredible mimicking
calls that blew David Attenborough away! Learn about the most ancient of plants and
of the indigenous Yugambeh people who lived in harmony with the land, searching
for edible bush tucker, tools and medicinal rainforest plants. Watch out for the
cheeky satin bowerbirds and admire his assemblage of blue items; all to impress the
female!

Evening Tour


Or adventure into the dark as the rainforest comes alive. The hunt is on for glow-in-
the-dark fungi, mammals that many have never heard of like the phascogale,
melomys or antechinus and marvel by waterfalls and creeks at sunset as the
rainforests most important pollinators, the flying foxes fly out over head.
The subtropical rainforest is full of life that could never be imagined! Experience it
with me, your local rainforest guide!


ABOUT CANDICE


As a creator and storyteller, with a great interest in people and culture, Candice
pursued her love of the arts and studied filmmaking at university. Her studies lead to
Village Roadshow Studios on the Gold Coast and freelanced across various
departments in the film and television industry.
She found herself particularly fond of documentary work, and travelled all over
Australia, meeting world renowned scientists, politicians, community members and
tour guides, forming a deeper understanding and love of the natural world and all it’s
wonders.
After directing a documentary on the Great Barrier Reef, asking the question, ‘Can
our environment live in harmony with the economy?’ Candice felt the urgency to
share her knowledge of Australia’s natural places and inspire others with a love for
some of the world’s most beautiful, important and diverse places so it can be
protected and enjoyed for generations to come.
She soon after moved from the middle of Brisbane city to the top of a mountain, over
a thousand meters above sea level in the Gold Coast’s world heritage rainforests as
a nature and adventure guide, including work at the beloved heritage listed Binna
Burra lodge which sadly burnt to the ground in the 2019 wildfires. She is often
volunteering for citizen science projects and research field trips to build on her
experience and knowledge of the natural world.  The latest surveys lead herself and
a small team to the discovery of a new population of a rare and endangered
caterpillar. Her passion is evident in her guided walks and in-between tours she
works at a tropical plant nursery or is pursuing the next adventure, often finding her
way into a new forest, hoping to stumble upon the next undiscovered species.

products.name: Currumbin Wildlife Sanctuary - Southern Gold Coast - Northern NSW - Hop on Hop off Shuttle
products.shortDescription: Explore Southern Gold Coast and Northern NSW with our Hop on Hop off Bus! Visit Currumbin Wildlife Sanctuary, Burleigh Heads National Park, Husk Distillery, Tropical Fruit World, and more, Unlimited Hop on Hop off pass to all attractions.
products.description:
Create Your Own Adventure: Southern Gold Coast & Northern NSW Hop on Hop off Bus


Experience the ultimate freedom to explore the Southern Gold Coast and Northern New South Wales at your own pace with our Hop on Hop off Bus service. Operating every Monday and Friday, this flexible transportation option allows you unlimited access to a variety of attractions, from pristine beaches and national parks to cultural centres and gourmet destinations.


How It Works

• Unlimited Access: Enjoy unlimited hopping on and off between all listed attractions throughout the day.

• Convenient Pickups: Departures from various Gold Coast locations make it easy to start your adventure.

• Flexible Scheduling: Spend as much or as little time as you like at each stop. Simply catch the next bus when you’re ready to move on.


Featured Attractions


Currumbin Wildlife Sanctuary

Discover Australian Wildlife

Get up close with Australia’s unique animals at Currumbin Wildlife Sanctuary. Hand-feed kangaroos, cuddle a koala, and watch exciting wildlife shows. The sanctuary also features a high ropes adventure course for thrill-seekers.

• Highlights: Wildlife encounters, bird shows, TreeTop Challenge

• Ideal For: Families, animal lovers, adventure enthusiasts


Jellurgal Aboriginal Cultural Centre

Immerse in Indigenous Culture

Learn about the rich Aboriginal history of the Gold Coast at Jellurgal. Guided tours offer insights into Dreamtime stories, bush tucker, and the significance of the land.

• Highlights: Guided cultural walks, art gallery, storytelling

• Ideal For: Cultural enthusiasts, history buffs, educational groups


Burleigh Heads National Park

Nature’s Coastal Gem

Explore walking trails that weave through rainforest and offer stunning ocean views. Perfect for a leisurely hike or a picnic by the sea.

• Highlights: Coastal walks, wildlife spotting, panoramic viewpoints

• Ideal For: Nature lovers, hikers, photographers


Tropical Fruit World

A Feast for the Senses

Discover exotic fruits from around the world. Enjoy guided tours, fruit tastings, and family-friendly activities like mini-golf and farm animal encounters.

• Highlights: Fruit plantation tours, tastings, orchard discovery walks

• Ideal For: Foodies, families, horticulture enthusiasts


Catch a Crab

An Unforgettable River Adventure

Experience the Tweed River like never before. Participate in crab catching, oyster farming, and pelican feeding aboard a fun-filled cruise.

• Highlights: Crab catching, fishing, river cruise

• Ideal For: Adventure seekers, families, seafood lovers


The Spa at Salt

Relax and Rejuvenate

Indulge in luxurious spa treatments that will leave you refreshed. Choose from massages, facials, and wellness packages.

• Highlights: Spa treatments, wellness programs, relaxation lounges

• Ideal For: Couples, solo travellers needing relaxation, spa enthusiasts


Husk Distillery

Sip and Savour Local Spirits

Visit the home of Ink Gin and Husk Rum. Enjoy distillery tours, tastings, and a relaxing time in the cellar door and café overlooking the countryside.

• Highlights: Distillery tours, spirit tastings, scenic views

• Ideal For: Adults, spirit connoisseurs, those interested in craft distilling


Northern Rivers Rail Trail

Explore the Hinterland

Walk or cycle along the historic rail corridor, taking in the natural beauty and charm of the Northern Rivers region.

• Highlights: Scenic trails, heritage sites, outdoor exercise

• Ideal For: Cyclists, walkers, history enthusiasts


Murwillumbah

Artistic Heart of the Region

Discover local art at the Tweed Regional Gallery and Margaret Olley Art Centre. Stroll through the town’s vibrant streets filled with cafés, boutiques, and galleries.

• Highlights: Art galleries, shopping, dining

• Ideal For: Art lovers, shoppers, cultural explorers


Why Choose Our Hop on Hop off Bus?

• Customise Your Day: Tailor your itinerary to suit your interests.

• Comfort and Convenience: Travel in comfort without worrying about parking or navigation.

• Local Knowledge: Our friendly drivers can provide tips and information about each destination.


Booking Information

• Operating Days: Every Monday and Friday

• Pick-Up Locations: Multiple points across the Gold Coast

• Tickets: Available for purchase online or at select outlets


Embark on a journey where you hold the map. Whether you’re seeking adventure, relaxation, or cultural enrichment, the Southern Gold Coast and Northern NSW Hop on Hop off Bus offers a gateway to unforgettable experiences. Book your seat today and start creating your own adventure!


*This ticket is for bus transfers only and doesn’t include a Booking at any venues or attractions

products.name: Currumbin Wildlife Sanctuary entry - Includes Unlimited Hop on Hop off - Southern Gold Coast / Northern NSW
products.shortDescription:
Explore Southern Gold Coast and Northern NSW with our Hop on Hop off Bus! Visit Currumbin Wildlife Sanctuary, Burleigh Heads National Park, Husk Distillery, Tropical Fruit World.
This is a return Ticket that includes entry to the park
products.description:
Currumbin Wildlife Sanctuary Entry with Transfers from the Gold Coast


Experience the wonders of Currumbin Wildlife Sanctuary hassle-free with our package.

Your day begins with convenient return transfers from the Gold Coast to the sanctuary.

Upon arrival, immerse yourself in the beauty of Australian wildlife, from cuddly koalas to majestic kangaroos. Explore lush rainforest paths, encounter exotic birds in flight shows, and discover the thrill of feeding lorikeets.

After a day of adventure, relax and refuel with a delicious lunch at one of the park's charming eateries. (Not Included)

With over 1000 native animals, Currumbin Wildlife Sanctuary is home to one of the largest collections of Australian wildlife in the world. Established over 60 years ago, the Sanctuary has attracted millions of visitors and continues to promote opportunities to get closer and interact with Australia’s amazing wildlife. Set amongst 27 hectares of lush Eucalyptus and rainforest visitors can see many of Australia’s iconic species on display in their natural habitat. There are many interactive wildlife opportunities throughout the Sanctuary where you can cuddle a koala, feed a kangaroo, hold a baby crocodile or snake.

Currumbin Wildlife Sanctuary has 13 daily shows including 2 new shows by Blinky Bill & his friends, the Free Flight Bird Show, Australiana Sheep Shearing Show, Dr. Doo-Lots and the Creature Teachers and the Yugambeh Aboriginal Dancers. Other notable highlights include the feeding of Boss Hog, a saltwater crocodile almost 5 metres in length, the cassowaries, wombats, Tasmanian devils, forest fringe birds and koalas.

Included in the admission price is the Wildlife Hospital Precinct where you can watch the vets in action. Dedicated to the care and rehabilitation of not only the local wildlife at the sanctuary, the wildlife hospital admits over 8500 animal patients brought in by the local community annually.

Currumbin Wildlife Sanctuary is a non for profit organisation with all proceeds reinvested back into the Sanctuary, Hospital and into conservation based research, caring for sick and injured wildlife.


Adult - 14 and over

Child 3 -13

Infant - Under 3

Senior 67+


Pickup from the Gold Coast 8:30am

Embark on a luxurious journey through the scenic vineyards of the Gold Coast with our exclusive wine tours. Explore the hidden gems of Australia's premier wine regions, tasting exquisite, locally-produced wines that showcase the rich diversity and unique characteristics of the area. Our Gold Coast Wine Tour is meticulously designed for wine enthusiasts and novices alike, offering an unparalleled experience of guided tastings, vineyard tours, and gourmet dining amidst picturesque landscapes. Discover the art of winemaking from passionate vintners, savor the flavors of expertly paired meals, and indulge in the serene beauty of the Gold Coast. Perfect for special occasions, romantic getaways, or as a sophisticated day out, our wine tours promise a memorable adventure filled with luxury, education, and enjoyment. Book your spot today and raise your glass to the exquisite world of Gold Coast wines.

products.name: Early Bird - Hop on Hop off Day Pass - Tamborine Mountain
products.shortDescription: The Hop on hop off Bus to Tamborine Mountain, while not a traditional guided tour, serves as a convenient gateway  to discover the charm of Tamborine Mountain, With Unlimited Hop on Hop off to all attractions on Tamborine Mountain.
products.description:
Discovering the Natural Beauty: The Hinterland Explorer from the Gold Coast


The Gold Coast, Australia, is renowned for its stunning beaches, vibrant nightlife, and thrilling theme parks. However, nestled just a short drive inland is a hidden treasure trove of natural beauty and tranquility known as the Gold Coast Hinterland. Hop on Hop off is not just a bus; it's a convenient and flexible mode of transportation that provides both tourists and locals with access to this captivating region, allowing them to explore at their own pace. With departures available each day, this unique bus service offers an opportunity to escape the bustling coastal city and immerse oneself in the serene landscapes of the hinterland.


Exploring the Gold Coast Hinterland

The Gold Coast Hinterland is a diverse and breathtaking region that offers a wide range of natural wonders, charming villages, and cultural experiences. The Hop on hop off Bus to Tamborine Mountain, while not a traditional guided tour, serves as a convenient gateway for travellers to discover the beauty and the charm of Tamborine Mountain, and even the urban allure of Brisbane City at their own pace.


Tamborine Mountain

The Hop on Hop off Bus's journey continues to the charming village of Tamborine Mountain, known for its boutique wineries, galleries, and stunning vistas. 

Upon arrival, passengers can use the Hop on hop off bus to conveniently access the village's attractions, including wineries, rainforest walks, and the popular Gallery Walk shopping precinct. The freedom to hop on and off the bus provides travellers with the flexibility to create their own Tamborine Mountain experience.

Tamborine Mountain - Shuttle

*Unlimited Hop on Hop off Option includes all transport around Tamborine Mountain for one day


Pickup Locations and Timetable

Gold Coast
8:30am pickup from City
3:30pm Departure for 5pm return

Hop on Hop off - Tamborine

 

Create Your Own Adventure: Tamborine Mountain Hop on Hop off Bus

Experience the beauty and charm of Tamborine Mountain with our flexible Hop on Hop off Bus service. Operating daily, this convenient transportation option allows you unlimited access to the mountain’s top attractions. Whether you’re a nature lover, foodie, or adventure seeker, tailor your day to suit your interests.

How It Works

•Unlimited Access: Hop on and off as many times as you like throughout the day.

•Convenient Pickups: Start your journey from various Gold Coast locations.

•Flexible Scheduling: Spend as much time as you want at each stop. Catch the next bus when you’re ready to move on.

 

Featured Attractions - Please look at the Map in the image Gallery to see all attractions.

 

 

Tamborine Rainforest Skywalk

Walk Among the Treetops

Experience the rainforest like never before on the Tamborine Rainforest Skywalk. This eco-adventure takes you on a 1.5 km walk through the beautiful middle and upper canopies of the rainforest.

•Highlights: Skywalk bridge, cantilever bridge, Cedar Creek viewing platform

•Ideal For: Nature enthusiasts, families, photographers

 

Glow Worm Caves Tamborine Mountain

A Magical Underground Experience

Visit the Glow Worm Caves at Cedar Creek Estate and witness thousands of glowing creatures lighting up the darkness in a purpose-built cave.

•Highlights: Guided tours, glow worm viewing, Cedar Creek Estate Winery

•Ideal For: Families, nature lovers, educational trips

 

Gallery Walk Tamborine Mountain

Shopping and Dining Haven

Stroll down Gallery Walk, Tamborine Mountain’s famous strip of boutiques, art galleries, cafés, and speciality shops offering everything from local arts to delicious fudge.

•Highlights: Shopping, art galleries, dining options

•Ideal For: Shoppers, art enthusiasts, foodies

 

Witches Falls Winery

Sip Award-Winning Wines

Enjoy wine tastings at Queensland’s oldest continuously operating winery. Relax in the cellar door or picnic among the vineyards.

•Highlights: Wine tasting, cheese platters, vineyard views

•Ideal For: Wine lovers, couples, groups

 

Cedar Creek Estate Vineyard & Winery

Wine, Art, and More

Visit Cedar Creek Estate for wine tasting, stroll through the art gallery, or enjoy a meal at the restaurant overlooking the lake.

•Highlights: Wine tasting, restaurant, art gallery, Glow Worm Caves

•Ideal For: Wine enthusiasts, families, art lovers

 

Tamborine Mountain Distillery

Award-Winning Spirits

Discover handcrafted liqueurs and spirits at Australia’s most internationally awarded distillery. Taste unique flavours and learn about the distilling process.

•Highlights: Spirit and liqueur tastings, distillery tours, gift shop

•Ideal For: Spirit connoisseurs, adults, those interested in craft distilling

 

Tamborine Mountain Glades - Previously Thunderbird Park

Adventure in Nature

Experience a range of activities including high ropes courses at the TreeTop Challenge, laser skirmish, mini-golf, and gemstone fossicking.

•Highlights: Adventure activities, camping, horse riding

•Ideal For: Families, adventure seekers, groups

 

Curtis Falls

Serene Waterfall Walk

Take a tranquil walk through lush rainforest to the beautiful Curtis Falls. Enjoy the sights and sounds of nature along the way.

•Highlights: Rainforest walk, waterfall viewing, birdwatching

•Ideal For: Nature lovers, photographers, hikers

 

Fortitude Brewing Company

Craft Beers and Good Times

Relax with a cold craft beer at the local brewery. Enjoy a variety of brews in a friendly atmosphere.

•Highlights: Craft beer tastings, live music events

•Ideal For: Beer enthusiasts, groups, casual dining

 

Tamborine Mountain Botanic Gardens

Flora Paradise

Explore 11 hectares of beautiful gardens showcasing both native and exotic plants. Perfect for a peaceful stroll or a picnic.

•Highlights: Themed gardens, lake, picnic areas

•Ideal For: Garden enthusiasts, families, relaxation

Why Choose Our Hop on Hop off Bus?

products.shortDescription: Bring your friends and have the cable to yourself, or take advantage of this unique opportunity for a solo adventure. The cable can accommodate up to 50 people at a time, you'll have plenty of space to show off your skills.
products.description:
Experience the ultimate thrill of wakeboarding and kneeboarding at GC Wake Park! Immerse yourself in the exhilarating waters and enjoy a private session on our top-notch cable system.

Reserve your exclusive hour-long session at GC Wake Park today and indulge in the refreshing water and personalised attention from our dedicated staff.

You can have the entire cable to yourself, without any minimum number requirements. Bring your friends, or take advantage of this unique opportunity for a solo adventure. Our cable can accommodate up to 50 people at a time, ensuring you have plenty of space to showcase your skills.

When you book a private session, you'll receive a complete package that includes a helmet, basic wakeboard, kneeboard, and vests. Whether you're a seasoned pro or a first-time rider, our professional staff is available on-site to assist and guide you, ensuring you have an unforgettable experience.

As you navigate through the park, you'll encounter floating jump ramps and challenging obstacles. These features are designed for experienced riders seeking an extra dose of excitement. If you're up for the challenge, make sure to ride with an obstacle-equipped wakeboard and boots to fully explore these thrilling elements.

Don't miss out on the opportunity to enjoy Wakeboarding & Kneeboarding at GC Wake Park. Reserve your private session now and embark on an adventure that will leave you with memories to cherish.

products.name: Groups - Tamborine Mountain Rainforest Skywalk + Glow Worm Cave Tour + Waterfalls or Shopping
products.shortDescription: Tour from Brisbane or Gold Coast Hotels to Tamborine Rainforest Skywalk, after you finish your morning adventures you will visit the famous Glow Worm Caves of Tamborine Mountain and some local lookouts.
products.description:
8:00am or 1:30pm Pickup - 5 Hrs Total


Pricing for Smaller or Larger Groups available on request


Brisbane and Gold Coast

8:00am Pickup from City
12:00pm Departure for 1pm return

1:30pm Pickup from City
5:30pm Departure for 6pm return


----------------------------------------------

Tamborine Rainforest Skywalk

Overview

The Tamborine Rainforest Skywalk offers a unique and immersive experience, allowing visitors to explore the lush canopy of the rainforest from an elevated perspective. Situated in the Gold Coast Hinterland of Queensland, Australia, this eco-adventure attraction provides an opportunity to delve into the natural beauty and biodiversity of the Tamborine Mountain region.

Experience

The Skywalk comprises a 1.5-kilometre long path that combines forest floor trails, 300 meters of steel bridges through the upper canopy, and a cantilever bridge that soars 30 meters above the creek and rainforest below. This design ensures that visitors can appreciate the varying layers of the rainforest, from the towering trees to the intricate undergrowth.

Highlights

  • Cantilever Bridge: One of the most exhilarating parts of the walk, offering breathtaking views over the rainforest and the Cedar Creek below.
  • Interpretive Signage: Along the way, interpretive signs provide fascinating insights into the flora and fauna, as well as the geological features of the area.
  • Bird Watching: The elevated pathways provide an excellent vantage point for bird watching, with species like the Paradise Riflebird and the Albert’s Lyrebird often spotted.

Eco-Friendly Initiative

The Skywalk is constructed with minimal environmental impact in mind. The materials used and the construction process were carefully chosen to protect the natural habitat, ensuring that the ecosystem remains undisturbed for future generations.

------------------------------------------------

Glow Worm Caves on Tamborine Mountain

Overview

The Glow Worm Caves, located on Tamborine Mountain, offer a magical subterranean experience that showcases the bioluminescent beauty of glow worms. These man-made caves are part of Cedar Creek Estate Vineyard and Winery and are designed to provide a controlled environment where glow worms can thrive and be observed up close.

Experience

Visitors are guided through the caves, where the darkness is punctuated by the mesmerising blue-green glow of thousands of tiny bioluminescent creatures. The guided tours are educational, providing detailed information about the glow worms’ life cycle, habitat, and the science behind their bioluminescence.

Highlights

  • Bioluminescent Display: The primary attraction is the ethereal glow created by the Arachnocampa flava, a species of glow worm native to Queensland.
  • Educational Tours: Knowledgeable guides offer insights into the ecological importance of glow worms and the efforts being made to conserve their natural habitats.
  • Interactive Learning: The tour includes interactive displays and information panels that explain the biology of glow worms and the environmental conditions they require.

Conservation Efforts

The Glow Worm Caves are part of a broader conservation effort aimed at protecting these delicate creatures. By creating a controlled environment, the caves help alleviate the pressure on wild populations, which are often threatened by habitat destruction and human interference.

Visiting Tips

  1. Plan Ahead: Both attractions are popular, so booking in advance is recommended, especially during peak tourist seasons.
  2. Wear Comfortable Footwear: The Skywalk involves a fair amount of walking, so comfortable shoes are a must.
  3. Respect Nature: Both sites emphasise environmental conservation. Follow all guidelines to minimise your impact on the delicate ecosystems.
  4. Bring a Camera: The Skywalk offers stunning photographic opportunities, though photography inside the Glow Worm Caves is restricted to protect the glow worms.


------------------------------------------------

Additional Activities: Waterfalls or Shopping on the Gallery Walk


Waterfalls

For those looking to extend their nature adventure, a short walk from the Bus Parking leads to a serene Waterfall. This picturesque waterfall is a favourite spot for both locals and visitors, offering a tranquil escape within the heart of the rainforest.

Highlights:
  • Natural Cascades: The falls cascade into a series of natural rock pools, perfect for some fantastic Photos.
  • Picnic Areas: Several well-maintained picnic spots with tables and benches provide an ideal setting for a relaxing lunch surrounded by nature.
  • Walking Trails: A network of walking trails meanders through the surrounding bushland, offering varying levels of difficulty and a chance to spot local wildlife.

Gallery Walk

For a more leisurely experience, visitors can spend some time exploring the vibrant Gallery Walk on Tamborine Mountain. This bustling strip is home to an eclectic mix of shops, cafes, and art galleries, making it the perfect place to indulge in some retail therapy or simply enjoy the local culture.

Highlights:
  • Boutique Shops: Discover unique treasures in the many boutique shops offering handmade crafts, jewellery, and local produce.
  • Art Galleries: Explore the creative side of Tamborine Mountain with visits to numerous art galleries showcasing works by local artists.
  • Cafes and Restaurants: Take a break and enjoy a coffee or a meal at one of the charming cafes or restaurants, many of which offer alfresco dining with views of the mountain.
  • Specialty Stores: From gourmet chocolates and cheeses to artisan wines and spirits, Gallery Walk offers a variety of specialty stores that cater to every taste.

products.name: Hinterland Explorer - 1 DAY PASS
products.shortDescription: Embark on a journey of discovery with the Hinterland Explorer Pass! Whether you're a nature enthusiast, a cultural explorer, or simply seeking a refreshing escape, our pass offers you the flexibility to curate your own adventure.
products.description:
Hinterland Explorer


This pass allows unlimited travel on the Hinterland Explorer - Multi Day Passes also available

  • 1 Day Pass
  • Infant Free - If travelling on lap
  • Self Guided walks
  • Stops at all key attractions in each region
  • Different Regions each day


Embark on a journey of discovery with the Hinterland Explorer Pass! Whether you're a nature enthusiast, a cultural explorer, or simply seeking a refreshing escape, our pass offers you the flexibility to curate your own adventure. Guests can choose between day passes or multi-day passes and explore a different captivating region each day from our carefully curated list, including Tamborine Mountain, Springbrook, Binna Burra, Byron Bay, Brisbane, and Lamington National Park. Immerse yourself in the natural wonders, cultural gems, and outdoor adventures that each region has to offer, creating unforgettable memories with every exploration. With the Hinterland Explorer Pass, your Australian hinterland adventure awaits!


Pickup Locations and Timetable

  • Gold Coast
  • 6:30am pickup from Surfers Paradise Transit Centre


Regions that you can visit with the Hinterland Explorer Day Pass


  1. Tamborine Mountain (Wednesday and Saturday):

    • Explore the lush Tamborine Mountain, a haven for nature lovers.
    • Attractions: Tamborine Rainforest Skywalk, Gallery Walk, Curtis Falls, Glow Worm Caves, Tamborine Botanic Gardens.

  2. Springbrook (Monday and Thursday):

    • Discover the enchanting beauty of Springbrook, known for its pristine rainforests and waterfalls.
    • Short Walks: (Recommended) Twin Falls, Bilbrough Falls, Best of All Lookout.
    • Attractions: Natural Bridge, Purling Brook Falls, Best of All Lookout, Springbrook Plateau, Canyon Lookout.

  3. Binna Burra (Monday and Thursday):

    • Binna Burra offers a tranquil escape amidst World Heritage-listed rainforests.
    • Attractions: Ships Stern Circuit, Tullawallal Circuit, Bellbird Lookout, Lamington Teahouse, Coomera Circuit.

  4. Byron Bay (Friday):

    • Experience the laid-back vibe of Byron Bay, a coastal gem famous for its beaches and artsy culture.
    • Attractions: Byron Bay Beaches, Cape Byron Lighthouse and enjoy a trip through the hinterland on the way.

  5. Brisbane (Tuesday):

    • Explore the vibrant city of Brisbane, where modernity meets culture and nature.
    • Attractions: South Bank Parklands, Queensland Art Gallery, Lone Pine Koala Sanctuary, Story Bridge Climb, Brisbane River Cruise.

  6. Lamington National Park (Sunday):

    • Lamington National Park is a UNESCO-listed paradise for hikers and wildlife enthusiasts.
    • Attractions: O'Reilly's Rainforest Retreat, Tree Top Walk, Toolona Creek Circuit, Box Forest Circuit, Albert River Circuit.

These regions offer a diverse range of natural beauty, cultural experiences, and outdoor adventures, making your Hinterland Explorer Pass a gateway to unforgettable moments in Australia's stunning hinterlands.

Please note that while you will be given history and insights along the way the driver will remain with the bus and all walks are self guided.


Extras:

Go Explore Cards

Start exploring for $10 a day


This pass can be added to your Day Pass then topped up as needed, you can use this to travel on all public transport around the Gold Coast and Sunshine Coast.

 

Explore breathtaking beaches, wildlife, theme parks and award winning dining on the Gold Coast and now, the Sunshine Coast.

The go explore card offers visitors and tourists freedom, flexibility and value for money!

  • only $10 a day for unlimited travel
  • no need to carry cash on your journeys
  • reload up to eight day passes on your card
  • travel on non-consecutive days.

products.name: Hop on Hop Off  - Brisbane City Loop - ATE25
products.shortDescription:
Hop on Hop off City Loop – Brisbane

Discover Brisbane your way with the Hop on Hop off City Loop – the easiest and most flexible way to explore the River City!
products.description:
Hop on Hop off City Loop – Brisbane


Discover Brisbane your way with the Hop on Hop off City Loop – the easiest and most flexible way to explore the River City!

Running every 30 minutes, our loop connects you to Brisbane’s top cultural, historical, and scenic spots. Whether you’re seeking world-class museums, stunning river views, hidden laneways, or lush green spaces, you’re never far from something exciting. Jump on and off as often as you like, and explore each destination at your own pace. Perfect for first-time visitors and locals wanting a fresh perspective!


Ticket Options:

- $29 Single Trip: Great for one-way travel or connecting to the Hop on Hop off Tamborine Mountain service.

- $59 Three Trip: Perfect if you're planning to explore a couple of key locations.

- $99 Full Day: Unlimited travel for the day hop on and off at your leisure to enjoy the full Brisbane experience.



Stops:

1. South Bank

2. Petrie Terrace

3. Inner City (No.1 Anzac Square)

4. Bowen Terrace Lookout (New Farm/Bowen Hills Cliffs)

5. Kangaroo Point Cliffs


South Bank

Walking Distance:

• South Bank Parklands (free swimming at Streets Beach)

• Queensland Museum & Sciencentre (free entry)

• Queensland Art Gallery & Gallery of Modern Art (QAGOMA – free general admission)

• The Wheel of Brisbane (optional ticketed)

• Epicurious Garden (community edible garden)

• Brisbane Sign (great photo spot)

• Arbour Walk

• Riverside Green Playground (great for families)


Ferry Access:

• CityCat to North Quay, Eagle Street Pier, New Farm, or Kangaroo Point


Walking Tours:

• Free guided tours from the South Bank Visitor Centre

• Self-guided AR trails via Brisbane app


Petrie Terrace

Walking Distance:

• Suncorp Stadium (guided tours available)

• Caxton Street dining & heritage pubs

• The Barracks (cinema, dining, history)

• Roma Street Parkland (award-winning subtropical gardens – free entry)

• Ithaca War Memorial & Historical Walk


Nearby Experiences:

• Brisbane Arts Theatre

• Paddington’s antique stores and café scene (just uphill)


Inner City (No.1 Anzac Square)

Walking Distance:

• Anzac Square & Memorial Galleries (free entry)

• King George Square

• Brisbane City Hall & Clock Tower Tour (free, bookings required)

• Museum of Brisbane (free entry)

• Queen Street Mall (shopping and street entertainment)

• City Botanic Gardens


Walking Tours:

• Brisbane Greeters (free local volunteer walking tours – book in advance)

• Heritage Trails (self-guided from Brisbane City Council)


Bowen Terrace Lookout / New Farm Cliffs


Walking Distance:

• Wilson Outlook Reserve (panoramic Story Bridge views)

• Howard Smith Wharves precinct (dining, brewery, free riverside space)

• New Farm Riverwalk to Powerhouse

• Merthyr Park & Sydney Street Ferry Terminal

• Brisbane Powerhouse (free exhibitions, riverside seating)


Ferry Access:

• Short ride to South Bank, Eagle Street, or Bulimba


Kangaroo Point Cliffs


Walking Distance:

• Kangaroo Point Cliffs Park (sunset views, rock climbing)

• Captain Burke Park (great Story Bridge views, picnic spot)

• Riverlife Adventure Centre (kayaks, rock climbing)

• Clifftop Walk to South Bank


Ferry Access:

• Dock at Holman Street Ferry Terminal or Thornton Street


Walking Tours:

• Kangaroo Point Heritage Walk (includes Yungaba immigration depot, early Brisbane landmarks)


Timetable:


Buses run every 30 minutes, 7 days a week. Hop on at any stop and enjoy Brisbane’s best, your way.

products.name: Hop on Hop Off  Wine Tour - Tamborine Mountain - From Brisbane - Flexi Pass
products.shortDescription: Adventure from Brisbane to the enchanting heights of Tamborine Mountain with our exclusive hop-on, hop-off bus service. Departing every morning from Brisbane. Enjoy the flexibility to explore Tamborine Mountains best Vineyards
products.description:
Tamborine Mountain Hop on Hop Off Wine Tour


This Flexi Pass enables you to only pay for what you taste along the winding trails of Tamborine Mountain.


TAMBORINE MOUNTAIN MAP


Pickup Locations and Timetable

Gold Coast
8:30am pickup from City
4:00pm Departure for 5pm return


Embark on a daily adventure from the heart of Brisbane to the enchanting heights of Tamborine Mountain with our exclusive hop-on, hop-off bus service. With no public bus routes to this picturesque locale, our service offers a unique opportunity to explore the lush landscapes and breathtaking views of Tamborine Mountain at your own pace. Departing every morning from Brisbane, our comfortable buses provide a direct link to the natural beauty and serene environment of one of Queensland's most treasured destinations. Enjoy the flexibility to explore the mountain's famous wineries, artisanal shops, and stunning walking trails before hopping back on the bus to return to the city. This service is your gateway to experiencing the tranquility of Tamborine Mountain, making it an unmissable adventure for both locals and visitors alike.


Wineries, Breweries, Distilleries

  1. Cedar Creek Estate Vineyard & Winery
  2. Hampton Estate Wines - Booking with Venue Required
  3. Castle Glen Australia
  4. Cauldron Distillery
  5. Fortitude Brewing Company
  6. Witches Falls Winery
  7. Tamborine Mountain Distillery
  8. Tamborine Mountain Coffee Plantation

Some other Stops you might like to Hop off at along the way.

Nature Based Tourism, Lookouts, local attractions

  1. Tamborine Mountain Skywalk
  2. Tamborine Mountain Coffee Plantation
  3. Tamborine Mountain Botanic Gardens
  4. Gallery Walk Shopping Precinct
  5. St Bernards Hotel - Booking Recommended
  6. Jasmine Organics
  7. Robert Sowter Park - (Lookout)
  8. Rotary Lookout
  9. Visitor Information Centre
  10. Tamborine Mountain Cheese
  11. Curtis Falls Walking track
  12. Cedar Creek Falls
  13. Witches Falls Walking Trail
  14. Tamborine National Park
  15. Witches Falls Circuit
  16. Thunderbird Park
  17. Palm Grove Section

Each of these attractions offers a unique experience, from tasting locally produced wines and spirits to exploring the natural beauty and artistic culture of Tamborine Mountain.

Return to  Brisbane

Depart Mountain 3:30pm

Arrive Gold Coast 4:30pm


Gold Coast and Brisbane Shuttles will join this service and you will have an unlimited hop on hop off pass for the day.


Please look at your itinerary and plan which venues you would like to see and let the driver know so they can mark it off on our pickup list for the day.


*This ticket is for hop on hop off shuttle transfers only and doesn’t include entry to an attractions

products.name: Hop on Hop off Brewery adventure - Tamborine Mountain - From Brisbane
products.shortDescription: A beer lover’s dream adventure from Brisbane to the craft brewery haven of Tamborine Mountain with our hop-on, hop-off bus. This brewery-focused journey offers the flexibility to explore Tamborine Mountain’s best brews, one stop at a time.
products.description:
Tamborine Mountain Hop on Hop Off Brewery Adventure


Pickup Locations and Timetable


Brisbane

• 8:30am Pickup from City

• 3:30pm Departure for 5pm return


Inclusions for the Hop on Hop Off Brewery Adventure

• Unlimited Hop on Hop Off Access: Enjoy the freedom to explore Tamborine Mountain’s top craft breweries, wineries, distilleries, and attractions at your own pace.

• Knowledgeable Local Guide: Our friendly guides provide insider tips, beer recommendations, and local insights to make your day unforgettable.

• New Air-Conditioned Buses: Travel in comfort with modern, climate-controlled vehicles designed for a relaxing experience.

• Convenient City Pickups: Hassle-free departures from accessible locations around Brisbane.

• Experienced Operator: Benefit from a company with 10 years of expertise in creating exceptional tour experiences.

• Family-Friendly Service: All venues welcome families, making this a great day out for everyone.

• Flexible Itinerary: Tailor your adventure by choosing your stops and letting the driver know your preferences.

• Exclusive Discounts: Access special deals and discounts at select breweries—just ask your driver on the day.

• Scenic Journey: Enjoy breathtaking views and picturesque landscapes as you travel through Tamborine Mountain.

• Sustainable Tourism: Support eco-conscious practices with a company committed to sustainable and responsible tourism.

• Free “Beer Map”: Available exclusively to booked passengers for a comprehensive guide to Tamborine Mountain’s best craft breweries and pubs.

• Live Assistance: Access real-time support from our team to help you plan and maximise your day.


Embark on the ultimate beer lover’s journey with our daily hop-on, hop-off bus service from Brisbane to Tamborine Mountain, a craft beer paradise nestled in the hinterland. With no public bus routes to this scenic destination, our service provides the perfect opportunity to explore Tamborine Mountain’s thriving craft beer scene, including stops at renowned breweries like Fortitude Brewing Company and other must-visit locations for beer enthusiasts.

But the adventure doesn’t stop there—Tamborine Mountain is also home to exceptional wineries and distilleries, including Cedar Creek Estate Vineyard & Winery, Witches Falls Winery, and Cauldron Distillery, where you can indulge in locally crafted wines, spirits, and liqueurs.

For those looking to combine their love of beer with breathtaking natural beauty, Tamborine Mountain offers a range of attractions, from tranquil walking trails and waterfalls to stunning lookouts and lush botanic gardens. Shop along the charming Gallery Walk, visit artisanal shops like Tamborine Mountain Cheese or Jasmine Organics, and explore unique landmarks like the Tamborine Mountain Skywalk and Curtis Falls Walking Track.

With our flexible hop-on, hop-off service, you can create your perfect day, visiting as many venues and attractions as you like. Simply let your driver know your itinerary, and they’ll mark your stops for the day.


Gold Coast and Brisbane Hop on Hop on Hop off buses are integrated with this service, giving you an unlimited hop-on, hop-off pass for the day.




Return to Brisbane

• Depart Mountain: 3:30pm

• Arrive Brisbane: 5:00pm


Once you have booked feel free to ask our team for the "Beer Map" only available to booked passengers.


This ticket is for the hop-on, hop-off service only and does not include entry to attractions or tasting fees or food. Some venues will provide a Pineapple Tours discount ask the driver for more information on the day.

products.name: Hop on Hop off Bus - Brisbane City Loop
products.shortDescription: Explore Brisbane City with our city loop hop-on, hop-off bus! Discover top attractions with the freedom to hop on and off all day, visiting key attractions around Brisbane City, There is also a Single Trip + Tamborine Mountain Pass
products.description:
Brisbane City Loop Hop on Hop off Bus


Pickup Locations and Timetable

South Bank - Emporium Southbank: 8:00am first pickup

Buses loop every 30–60 minutes

Last service departs South Bank at 4:30pm


Hop on Hop off – Brisbane City Loop


Discover Brisbane Your Way: Brisbane City Loop Hop on Hop off Bus


Experience the best of Brisbane at your own pace with our flexible Hop on Hop off Bus service. Operating daily from South Bank, this service lets you explore Brisbane’s top attractions, cultural landmarks, and scenic locations with complete freedom. Whether you’re sightseeing, shopping, or dining out, hop on and off as often as you like.


How It Works

• Unlimited Access: Jump on and off throughout the day across multiple stops.

• Convenient Start: Begin your day from South Bank or join at any designated stop.

• Flexible Schedule: Spend as much or as little time as you like at each location.


Featured Stops – Please see the map in the image gallery for all locations


1. South Bank Parklands

Brisbane’s Riverfront Playground

Relax on the man-made beach, wander through lush parklands, or visit the Queensland Museum and GOMA.

• Highlights: Streets Beach, Wheel of Brisbane, restaurants, museums

• Ideal For: Families, art lovers, foodies


2. Petrie Terrace / Caxton Street

Sport and Pub Scene

Home to Suncorp Stadium and lively pubs, perfect for sports fans or a classic Aussie meal.

• Highlights: Suncorp Stadium, local pubs, dining spots

• Ideal For: Sports fans, casual diners, nightlife seekers


3. No. 1 Anzac Square

Heritage and Honour

Pay respects at the Eternal Flame and discover Brisbane’s wartime history in this tranquil memorial space.

• Highlights: Anzac Square, Brisbane Central Station access

• Ideal For: History buffs, quiet reflection


4. Howard Smith Wharves

Riverside Dining and Views

Soak up the city skyline with world-class food and drinks along the Brisbane River.

• Highlights: Breweries, restaurants, Story Bridge views

• Ideal For: Foodies, photographers, casual evenings


5. Kangaroo Point Cliffs

Iconic Views and Adventure

A perfect stop for a morning climb or sunset photo with breathtaking views of the city skyline.

• Highlights: Climbing, walking trails, lookout points

• Ideal For: Adventure seekers, photographers, couples


Why Choose Our Hop on Hop off Bus?

• Create Your Own Itinerary: Spend your time where it matters most.

• Relax and Ride: No need to worry about traffic or parking.

• Local Tips: Our friendly drivers share local insights and hidden gems.


Booking Information

• Operating Days: Daily

• First Departure: 8:00am from South Bank

• Final Loop: Departs South Bank at 4:30pm

• Tickets: Book online or from selected outlets


Enjoy a full day exploring Brisbane’s vibrant inner-city neighbourhoods, river views, and cultural hotspots with one easy ticket. Your adventure, your schedule.


This ticket is for hop on hop off shuttle transport only and does not include entry to any attractions.

TAMBORINE MOUNTAIN MAP

Meet at any of the locations on the map and the bus will travel around the mountain once every hour, tickets must be booked in advance.


For one way Transfers please include:

Pickup Address

Drop off Address

(Only services on top of Tamborine Mountain)


For Brisbane Pickups

Hop on Hop Off Bus - Tamborine Mountain - From Brisbane

For Gold Coast Pickups

TAMBORINE MOUNTAIN MAP

products.name: Hop on Hop Off Bus - Movie World - from Brisbane
products.shortDescription: Embark on an adventure from theGold Coast to the enchanting heights of Tamborine Mountain with our exclusive hop-on, hop-off bus service. Departing every morning from Gold Coast. Enjoy the flexibility to explore Tamborine Mountain.
products.description:
Tamborine Mountain Hop on Hop Off Bus


TAMBORINE MOUNTAIN MAP


Pickup Locations and Timetable

Gold Coast
8:30am pickup from City
4:00pm Departure for 5pm return


Embark on a daily adventure from the heart of the Gold Coast to the enchanting heights of Tamborine Mountain with our exclusive hop-on, hop-off bus service. With no public bus routes to this picturesque locale, our service offers a unique opportunity to explore the lush landscapes and breathtaking views of Tamborine Mountain at your own pace. Departing every morning from the Gold Coast, our comfortable buses provide a direct link to the natural beauty and serene environment of one of Queensland's most treasured destinations. Enjoy the flexibility to explore the mountain's famous wineries, artisanal shops, and stunning walking trails before hopping back on the bus to return to the city. This service is your gateway to experiencing the tranquility of Tamborine Mountain, making it an unmissable adventure for both locals and visitors alike.



Nature Based Tourism, Lookouts, local attractions

  1. Tamborine Mountain Skywalk
  2. Tamborine Mountain Coffee Plantation
  3. Tamborine Mountain Botanic Gardens
  4. Gallery Walk Shopping Precinct
  5. St Bernards Hotel - Booking Recommended
  6. Jasmine Organics
  7. Robert Sowter Park - (Lookout)
  8. Rotary Lookout
  9. Visitor Information Centre
  10. Tamborine Mountain Cheese
  11. Curtis Falls Walking track
  12. Cedar Creek Falls
  13. Witches Falls Walking Trail
  14. Tamborine National Park
  15. Witches Falls Circuit
  16. Thunderbird Park
  17. Palm Grove Section


Wineries, Breweries, Distilleries

  1. Cedar Creek Estate Vineyard & Winery
  2. Hampton Estate Wines - Booking with Venue Required
  3. Castle Glen Australia
  4. Cauldron Distillery
  5. Fortitude Brewing Company
  6. Witches Falls Winery
  7. Tamborine Mountain Distillery
  8. Tamborine Mountain Coffee Plantation

Each of these attractions offers a unique experience, from tasting locally produced wines and spirits to exploring the natural beauty and artistic culture of Tamborine Mountain.

Return to Gold Coast and Brisbane

Depart Mountain 4:00pm

Arrive Gold Coast 5pm


Gold Coast and Brisbane Shuttles will join this service and you will have an unlimited hop on hop off pass for the day.


Please look at your itinerary and plan which venues you would like to see and let the driver know so they can mark it off on our pickup list for the day.


*This ticket is for hop on hop off shuttle transfers only and doesn’t include entry to an attractions

products.name: Hop on Hop off Bus - Single Trip - Brisbane City Loop + Unlimited Hop on Hop off - Tamborine Mountain
products.shortDescription: This is a Single Trip Brisbane City Loop + Unlimited Tamborine Mountain Pass. with the hop-on, hop-off bus! Preview of Brisbane City with our Brisbane City Loop then Hop-on Hop-off all day around the sites of Tamborine Mountain.
products.description:
Single Trip Brisbane City Loop + Unlimited Tamborine Mountain Hop on Hop off Pass


Explore the Best of Brisbane and the Scenic Beauty of Tamborine Mountain – All in One Pass


Start your day in Brisbane at 8am and finish it among the rainforests, wineries, and waterfalls of Tamborine Mountain.This flexible all-in-one pass includes one full loop on the Brisbane City Hop on Hop off Bus plus unlimited access to the Tamborine Mountain Hop on Hop off Shuttle for the entire day with return transfers from Brisbane.


Brisbane City Loop Hop on Hop off Bus


Pickup Locations and Timetable

• First Pickup: 8:00am from South Bank – Emporium South Bank

• Loop Frequency: Single Trip of the Brisbane City before connecting with the Tamborine Mountain Hop on Hop off.

• Connecting Bus: 9:00am

• Tamborine Mountain: 10:15am - 3:30pm

• Brisbane Drop off: 5:00pm


Featured Brisbane City Stops (You may get on at any stop but the single loop starts and finishes at Southbank)


1. South Bank Parklands – Riverfront parklands, museums, and a man-made beach

2. Petrie Terrace / Caxton Street – Iconic pubs and stadium vibes

3. No. 1 Anzac Square – Tranquil war memorial in the heart of the city

4. Howard Smith Wharves – Riverside dining with skyline views

5. Kangaroo Point Cliffs – Adventure, views, and photo ops galore


Unlimited Tamborine Mountain Hop on Hop off Shuttle


Pickup Locations and Times

• Depart Brisbane at 8:00am from South Bank

• Arrive at Tamborine Mountain around 10:15am

• Shuttle Loops Across the Mountain every 30–60 minutes

• Final Return to Brisbane at 3:30pm for a 5:00pm arrival


What’s Included

• Single Full Loop on the Brisbane City Hop on Hop off Bus

• Unlimited Stops all day on Tamborine Mountain

• Easy transfers between scenic, foodie, and cultural hotspots

• Local tips from friendly drivers along the way


Why Choose This Pass?

• Flexible Exploration: Make the most of two regions in one day

• Seamless Transfers: From the city to the mountains and back

• Packed with Experiences: Nature, food, culture, and wine

• No Hassle: Forget traffic, parking, and complex schedules


Booking Details

• Brisbane City Loop: Single trip valid on day of travel

• Tamborine Mountain Loop: Unlimited hop on hop off for the full day

• Tickets: Book online or at participating locations

• Note: Entry to attractions is not included


One Pass. Two Worlds.

From Brisbane’s buzzing streets to Tamborine’s tranquil rainforests, enjoy the best of both worlds – your way.

products.additionalInformation:
- The Standard Starting Location is - 267 Grey St, South Brisbane QLD 4101 - Near Emporium Hotel Southbank

You are able to meet the bus at any of the other location but the bus will only do one loop before connecting with the bus to Tamborine Mountain.

- If there is time in the afternoon the returning bus may be able to complete the loop but this is not guaranteed as Brisbane Traffic in the afternoon can be unpredictable.

Enjoy the flexibility to explore the mountain's famous wineries, artisanal shops, and stunning walking trails before hopping back on the bus to return to the city. This service is your gateway to experiencing the tranquility of Tamborine Mountain, making it an unmissable adventure for both locals and visitors alike.



Nature Based Tourism, Lookouts, local attractions

  1. Tamborine Mountain Skywalk
  2. Tamborine Mountain Coffee Plantation
  3. Tamborine Mountain Botanic Gardens
  4. Gallery Walk Shopping Precinct
  5. St Bernards Hotel - Booking Recommended
  6. Jasmine Organics
  7. Robert Sowter Park - (Lookout)
  8. Rotary Lookout
  9. Visitor Information Centre
  10. Tamborine Mountain Cheese
  11. Curtis Falls Walking track
  12. Cedar Creek Falls
  13. Witches Falls Walking Trail
  14. Tamborine National Park
  15. Witches Falls Circuit
  16. Thunderbird Park
  17. Palm Grove Section


Wineries, Breweries, Distilleries

  1. Cedar Creek Estate Vineyard & Winery
  2. Hampton Estate Wines - Booking with Venue Required
  3. Castle Glen Australia
  4. Cauldron Distillery
  5. Fortitude Brewing Company
  6. Witches Falls Winery
  7. Tamborine Mountain Distillery
  8. Tamborine Mountain Coffee Plantation

Each of these attractions offers a unique experience, from tasting locally produced wines and spirits to exploring the natural beauty and artistic culture of Tamborine Mountain.

Return to Gold Coast and Brisbane

Depart Mountain 4:00pm

Arrive Gold Coast 5pm


Gold Coast and Brisbane Shuttles will join this service and you will have an unlimited hop on hop off pass for the day.


Please look at your itinerary and plan which venues you would like to see and let the driver know so they can mark it off on our pickup list for the day.


*This ticket is for hop on hop off shuttle transfers only and doesn’t include entry to an attractions

products.description:
Tour Inclusions:


This tour is ideal for all ages, combining nature, relaxation, and discovery.


• Comfortable return transport from the Brisbane to Tamborine Mountain.

• Access to the Hop on Hop off Bus service covering key attractions around Tamborine Mountain 

• Entry tickets to the Tamborine Rainforest Skywalk and Glow Worm Caves.

• Ample time to explore Tamborine Mountain’s shops, cafes, and natural beauty.

• Pickup from set locations around the city from 8:30am


Tour Description:


Embark on a day of discovery with the Hop on Hop off Bus to Tamborine Mountain, visiting two of the area’s top attractions—the Tamborine Rainforest Skywalk and the Glow Worm Caves. Travel in comfort and enjoy the flexibility to explore Tamborine Mountain’s unique charm at your leisure.

• Tamborine Rainforest Skywalk: A scenic eco-adventure through elevated walkways, bridges, and forest trails, offering spectacular views and a deeper connection to nature.

• Glow Worm Caves: Experience the enchanting glow of thousands of bioluminescent glow worms in a specially designed cave. A unique and unforgettable encounter!



Tamborine Mountain Attractions


Tamborine Mountain offers a rich tapestry of attractions, blending natural beauty with cultural charm. Discover lush rainforests, cascading waterfalls, and breathtaking lookouts with panoramic views. Explore boutique wineries, distilleries, and breweries that showcase local craftsmanship and flavours. Stroll through charming shopping precincts brimming with artisanal goods, art galleries, and specialty cafes. Immerse yourself in the mountain’s tranquil botanic gardens, serene walking trails, and vibrant wildlife, creating a perfect escape for every type of adventurer.
