products.name: Hop on Hop off Day Pass + Glow Worm Tour -  Brisbane Pickup
products.shortDescription: Glow worms only exist in Australia and New Zealand so come on a fantastic journey with is to meet these small but brightly glowing creatures, Guaranteed sightings and time for morning tea and scenic lookouts throughout the National Park.
products.description:
Daytime Scenic Rim Glow Worm Experience includes:

- Visit the Famous Glow Worm caves on Tamborine Mountain

- Daytime Tour so no need to go out late at night

- Drive through Tamborine Mountain National Park - No walking required
-Time for Lunch at Restaurants, cafes and eateries

- Gallery Walk -  for shopping and lunch

- Stop for photos at Scenic Lookouts
- Newest luxury vehicles
- Eco Friendly

Pickup 8:30 am - Drop Off 4:30 pm


Experience the Daytime Scenic Rim Glow Worm Adventure, a unique journey that seamlessly blends exploration, conservation, and relaxation. Embark on a guided tour to witness the mesmerizing glow worms in their natural habitat while enjoying the flexibility of a hop-on-hop-off bus tour around Tamborine Mountain.

Tour Inclusions:

  • Glow Worm Cave Exploration: Delve into the enchanting world of glow worms within a specially constructed cave. Led by knowledgeable guides, marvel at the luminescent beauty of these fascinating creatures, protected through restricted access to ensure their conservation.

  • Daytime Convenience: Experience the magic of glow worms without venturing out late at night. Our daytime tour schedule offers a convenient and accessible option for all.

  • Scenic Mountain Drive: Relax on board our luxury hop-on-hop-off bus as we traverse Tamborine Mountain National Park. Enjoy panoramic views without the need for strenuous walking.

  • Leisure Time: Take a break for lunch at your choice of restaurants, cafes, or eateries. Explore Gallery Walk, offering three hours of shopping and dining delights.

  • Scenic Lookout Stops: Capture stunning photographs at scenic viewpoints, immersing yourself in the natural beauty of the region.

  • Newest Luxury Vehicles: Travel in comfort and style aboard our eco-friendly luxury vehicles, ensuring a pleasurable journey throughout.

Tour Details:

  • Pickup: Commencing at 8:30am, we offer convenient pickups from Brisbane Marriott, Royal on the Park and Emporium Southbank.

  • Drop Off: Return to your hotel by 5:00 pm, concluding an unforgettable day of exploration and discovery - If you do need to depart before this our team can drop you at the Helensvale Train station after lunch which can get you back to Brisbane or the Gold Coast.

Conservation Focus:

  • Rainforest Restoration: Our tour takes you through a restored rainforest, the result of extensive replanting efforts atop Tamborine Mountain. Accompanied by trained biologists, traverse the boardwalks and delve into the glow worm habitat, witnessing their intricate silk threads and radiant glow up close.

  • Climate Conscious: Learn about the vital role of rainforests in the survival of glow worms and the challenges posed by climate change and human activities. Our specially designed glow worm cave offers optimal conditions for their well-being, mitigating environmental impacts.

Tour Highlights:

  • Hop on Hop off Bus: Begin your adventure with a scenic drive from your hotel to the Scenic Rim and Tamborine Mountain, setting the stage for an unforgettable journey.

  • Glow Worm Caves: Explore the renowned glow worm caves on Tamborine Mountain, immersing yourself in their ethereal glow and marveling at nature's wonders.

Experience the best of Tamborine Mountain's natural beauty and conservation efforts on our Daytime Scenic Rim Glow Worm Adventure, where every moment offers a glimpse into the extraordinary world of glow worms.

Pickup Locations:

Brisbane Marriott

Royal on the Park

Emporium Southbank


Tour Highlights

- Get picked up from your hotel and take a quick scenic drive out to the Scenic Rim and Tamborine Mountain

- Visit the Famous Glow Worm caves on Tamborine Mountain

- Learn about the History of Tamborine Mountain through the eyes of a local

- Time for morning tea at Restaurants, cafes and eateries

- Stop at lookouts along the way and enjoy views of the Scenic Rim

- Enjoy the Hop on Hop off bus to explore Tamborine Mountain

products.name: Hop on Hop off Distillery adventure - Tamborine Mountain - Brisbane
products.shortDescription: A spirit lover’s journey from Brisbane to Tamborine Mountain’s finest distilleries with our hop-on, hop-off bus. Enjoy the freedom to explore handcrafted gins, rums, and liqueurs at your own pace, one exceptional distillery at a time.
products.description:
Tamborine Mountain Hop on Hop Off Distillery Adventure


Pickup Locations and Timetable

Brisbane

• 8:30am Pickup from City

• 3:30pm Departure for 5:00pm return


Inclusions for the Hop on Hop Off Distillery Adventure

• Unlimited Hop on Hop Off Access: Enjoy the freedom to explore Tamborine Mountain’s top distilleries, breweries, wineries, and attractions at your own pace.

• Knowledgeable Local Guide: Our friendly guides provide insider tips, expert recommendations, and local insights to make your day unforgettable.

• New Air-Conditioned Buses: Travel in comfort with modern, climate-controlled vehicles designed for a relaxing experience.

• Convenient City Pickups: Hassle-free departures from accessible locations around Brisbane

• Experienced Operator: Benefit from a company with 10 years of expertise in creating exceptional tour experiences.

• Family-Friendly Service: All venues welcome families, making this a great day out for everyone.

• Flexible Itinerary: Tailor your adventure by choosing your stops and letting the driver know your preferences.

• Exclusive Discounts: Access special deals and discounts at select venues—just ask your driver on the day.

• Scenic Journey: Enjoy breathtaking views and picturesque landscapes as you travel through Tamborine Mountain.

• Sustainable Tourism: Support eco-conscious practices with a company committed to sustainable and responsible tourism.

• Free “Distillery Map”: Available exclusively to booked passengers for a comprehensive guide to Tamborine Mountain’s best stops.

• Live Assistance: Access real-time support from our team to help you plan and maximise your day.


Embark on the ultimate distillery adventure with our daily hop-on, hop-off bus service from Brisbane to Tamborine Mountain, a haven for handcrafted spirits and liqueurs. Explore renowned distilleries like Cauldron Distillery, Tamborine Mountain Distillery, and others, where you can sip on small-batch gins, rums, and unique local creations while learning about the artistry behind each spirit.


But the experience doesn’t end there. Tamborine Mountain is also home to exceptional breweries and wineries, including Fortitude Brewing Company, Cedar Creek Estate Vineyard & Winery, and Witches Falls Winery, offering a variety of craft beers and wines to complement your day.


For those who love nature and adventure, Tamborine Mountain boasts breathtaking walking trails, tranquil waterfalls, and stunning lookouts. Discover the charm of Gallery Walk, artisanal shops like Tamborine Mountain Cheese and Jasmine Organics, and landmarks such as the Tamborine Mountain Skywalk and Curtis Falls Walking Track.


With our flexible hop-on, hop-off service, you can create your perfect itinerary, visiting as many distilleries, breweries, and attractions as you like. Let your driver know your planned stops, and they’ll mark them off for the day.


Gold Coast and Brisbane Hop on Hop Off buses are integrated with this service, giving you an unlimited hop-on, hop-off pass for the day.


Return Brisbane

• Depart Mountain: 3:30pm

• Arrive Gold Coast: 5:00pm


Once you’ve booked, feel free to ask our team for the exclusive “Distillery Map,” only available to booked passengers.


This ticket is for the hop-on, hop-off service only and does not include entry to attractions, tasting fees, or food. Some venues offer Pineapple Tours discounts—ask your driver for details on the day.

products.name: Hop on Hop off Wine Tasting Tour - From Brisbane
products.shortDescription: Join our Hop on Hop off Bus to Explore the Wineries of Mount Tamborine, enjoy guided tastings at each venue and then explore the mountain at your own leisure. You can try some local food, do some shopping or visit a rainforest waterfall.
products.description:
WINE TOUR INCLUDES

- Guided Tastings at two wineries

- Local Guide

- New Model Air-conditioned minibus

- Scenic Lookouts along the way

- Flexible Schedule 
- Fresh Mountain Water
- Eco Friendly
- Unlimited Hop on Hop off Day Pass

6 - 8 Hrs Approx.

Brisbane Pickup 8:30 - 9:00am

Tamborine Mountain Pickup 10:00 am - Drop Off 2:30pm (Approx)

Times can be adjusted for private bookings if needed.

Discover the authentic essence of Queensland's winemaking heritage on a short, yet profoundly genuine journey with Pineapple Tours. Escape the urban hustle of Brisbane or the lively Gold Coast for a brief but deeply immersive winery experience.

Intimate Winery Encounters:
Our curated tour takes you to select wineries where passion and tradition are woven into every bottle. Connect with winemakers and vintners, who will personally guide you through their craft, sharing stories and insights that only a local could provide.

Handcrafted Wines and Rustic Charm:
Sample limited-production wines that reflect the unique terroir of the region. These family-owned wineries offer a taste of the authentic, featuring handcrafted vintages not widely available. Savour these treasures in rustic settings that exude warmth and character.

Breathtaking Views, Genuine Hospitality:
As you journey through the countryside, relish in the stunning vistas that surround you. The farms in the region are more than just a backdrop; they're a living testament to the dedication of those who cultivate them. Experience the genuine hospitality of the growers and their families.

Memories to Cherish:
Though your visit may be brief, the memories you'll make and the wines you'll savour will linger. Take home a bottle or two of these small-batch wines, a genuine piece of Queensland's winemaking tradition to share with loved ones.

Easy and Personal:
Our tour provides easy, hassle-free transportation. You won't need to worry about logistics or navigation – simply immerse yourself in the authentic winery experience.

Join Us for a Slice of Authentic Queensland:
If you seek a genuine taste of Queensland's winemaking soul but have limited time, Pineapple Tours is your gateway. Come along for an authentic encounter with local winemakers, their craft, and the stunning landscapes that define their wines. Book your Pineapple Tours experience today and savour the authenticity of Queensland's wine culture.



* Tour Itinerary may change depending on venue trading days, weddings and functions
*If you are booking this as a private tour, you are welcome to choose the destinations and pick up/drop off times.
* Pick up and drop off times can vary depending on customer locations

As you journey through the countryside, relish in the stunning vistas that surround you. The farms in the region are more than just a backdrop; they're a living testament to the dedication of those who cultivate them. Experience the genuine hospitality of the growers and their families.

Memories to Cherish:
Though your visit may be brief, the memories you'll make and the wines you'll savour will linger. Take home a bottle or two of these small-batch wines, a genuine piece of Queensland's winemaking tradition to share with loved ones.

Easy and Personal:
Our tour provides easy, hassle-free transportation. You won't need to worry about logistics or navigation – simply immerse yourself in the authentic winery experience.

Join Us for a Slice of Authentic Queensland:
If you seek a genuine taste of Queensland's winemaking soul but have limited time, Pineapple Tours is your gateway. Come along for an authentic encounter with local winemakers, their craft, and the stunning landscapes that define their wines. Book your Pineapple Tours experience today and savour the authenticity of Queensland's wine culture.



* Tour Itinerary may change depending on venue trading days, weddings and functions
*If you are booking this as a private tour, you are welcome to choose the destinations and pick up/drop off times.
* Pick up and drop off times can vary depending on customer locations

products.name: Hop on Hop Off Wine Tour - Tamborine Mountain - from Gold Coast - Flexi Pass
products.shortDescription: Adventure from the Gold Coast to the enchanting heights of Tamborine Mountain with our exclusive hop-on, hop-off bus service. Departing every morning from Gold Coast. Enjoy the flexibility to explore Tamborine Mountains best Vineyards.
products.description:
Tamborine Mountain Hop on Hop Off Wine Tour


This Flexi Pass enables you to only pay for what you taste along the winding trails of Tamborine Mountain.


TAMBORINE MOUNTAIN MAP


Pickup Locations and Timetable

Gold Coast
8:30am pickup from City
4:00pm Departure for 5pm return


Embark on a daily adventure from the heart of the Gold Coast to the enchanting heights of Tamborine Mountain with our exclusive hop-on, hop-off bus service. With no public bus routes to this picturesque locale, our service offers a unique opportunity to explore the lush landscapes and breathtaking views of Tamborine Mountain at your own pace. Departing every morning from the Gold Coast, our comfortable buses provide a direct link to the natural beauty and serene environment of one of Queensland's most treasured destinations. Enjoy the flexibility to explore the mountain's famous wineries, artisanal shops, and stunning walking trails before hopping back on the bus to return to the city. This service is your gateway to experiencing the tranquility of Tamborine Mountain, making it an unmissable adventure for both locals and visitors alike.


Wineries, Breweries, Distilleries

  1. Cedar Creek Estate Vineyard & Winery
  2. Hampton Estate Wines - Booking with Venue Required
  3. Castle Glen Australia
  4. Cauldron Distillery
  5. Fortitude Brewing Company
  6. Witches Falls Winery
  7. Tamborine Mountain Distillery
  8. Tamborine Mountain Coffee Plantation

Some other Stops you might like to Hop off at along the way.

Nature Based Tourism, Lookouts, local attractions

  1. Tamborine Mountain Skywalk
  2. Tamborine Mountain Coffee Plantation
  3. Tamborine Mountain Botanic Gardens
  4. Gallery Walk Shopping Precinct
  5. St Bernards Hotel - Booking Recommended
  6. Jasmine Organics
  7. Robert Sowter Park - (Lookout)
  8. Rotary Lookout
  9. Visitor Information Centre
  10. Tamborine Mountain Cheese
  11. Curtis Falls Walking track
  12. Cedar Creek Falls
  13. Witches Falls Walking Trail
  14. Tamborine National Park
  15. Witches Falls Circuit
  16. Thunderbird Park
  17. Palm Grove Section

Each of these attractions offers a unique experience, from tasting locally produced wines and spirits to exploring the natural beauty and artistic culture of Tamborine Mountain.

Return to Gold Coast

Depart Mountain 3:30pm

Arrive Gold Coast 4:30pm


Gold Coast and Brisbane Shuttles will join this service and you will have an unlimited hop on hop off pass for the day.


Please look at your itinerary and plan which venues you would like to see and let the driver know so they can mark it off on our pickup list for the day.


*This ticket is for hop on hop off shuttle transfers only and doesn’t include entry to an attractions

products.name: Hop on Hop off Winery adventure - Tamborine Mountain - Brisbane
products.shortDescription: A wine lover’s journey to Tamborine Mountain’s finest wineries with our hop-on, hop-off bus. Enjoy the freedom to explore award-winning vineyards, sample exquisite local wines, and soak in the serene mountain scenery at your own pace.
products.description:
Tamborine Mountain Hop on Hop Off Wine Adventure


Pickup Locations and Timetable

Brisbane

• 8:30am Pickup from City

• 3:30pm Departure for 5:00pm return


Inclusions for the Hop on Hop Off Wine Adventure

• Unlimited Hop on Hop Off Access: Enjoy the freedom to explore Tamborine Mountain’s top wineries, distilleries, breweries, and attractions at your own pace.

• Knowledgeable Local Guide: Our friendly guides provide insider tips, wine recommendations, and local insights to make your day unforgettable.

• New Air-Conditioned Buses: Travel in comfort with modern, climate-controlled vehicles designed for a relaxing experience.

• Convenient City Pickups: Hassle-free departures from accessible locations around Brisbane.

• Experienced Operator: Benefit from a company with 10 years of expertise in creating exceptional tour experiences.

• Family-Friendly Service: All venues welcome families, making this a great day out for everyone.

• Flexible Itinerary: Tailor your adventure by choosing your stops and letting the driver know your preferences.

• Exclusive Discounts: Access special deals and discounts at select venues—just ask your driver on the day.

• Scenic Journey: Enjoy breathtaking views and picturesque landscapes as you travel through Tamborine Mountain.

• Sustainable Tourism: Support eco-conscious practices with a company committed to sustainable and responsible tourism.

• Free “Wine Map”: Available exclusively to booked passengers for a comprehensive guide to Tamborine Mountain’s best wineries and other stops.

• Live Assistance: Access real-time support from our team to help you plan and maximise your day.


Embark on the ultimate wine lover’s adventure with our daily hop-on, hop-off bus service from Brisbane to Tamborine Mountain, a picturesque haven for premium wines. Visit award-winning wineries like Cedar Creek Estate Vineyard & Winery, Witches Falls Winery, and Hampton Estate Wines, where you can sample exquisite local wines, learn about the winemaking process, and immerse yourself in the tranquil vineyard settings.


But the experience doesn’t stop there. Tamborine Mountain is also home to exceptional distilleries and breweries, including Cauldron Distillery and Fortitude Brewing Company, offering handcrafted spirits and beers to enhance your adventure.


For those who enjoy natural beauty and cultural experiences, Tamborine Mountain offers breathtaking walking trails, tranquil waterfalls, and stunning lookouts. Explore the charm of Gallery Walk, artisanal shops like Tamborine Mountain Cheese and Jasmine Organics, and iconic landmarks such as the Tamborine Mountain Skywalk and Curtis Falls Walking Track.


With our flexible hop-on, hop-off service, you can create your perfect day, visiting as many wineries, distilleries, and attractions as you like. Simply let your driver know your planned stops, and they’ll mark them off for the day.


Gold Coast and Brisbane Hop on Hop Off buses are integrated with this service, giving you an unlimited hop-on, hop-off pass for the day.


Return Brisbane

• Depart Mountain: 3:30pm

• Arrive Brisbane: 5:00pm


Once you’ve booked, feel free to ask our team for the exclusive “Wine Map,” only available to booked passengers.


This ticket is for the hop-on, hop-off service only and does not include entry to attractions, tasting fees, or food. Some venues offer Pineapple Tours discounts—ask your driver for details on the day.

products.name: Hot Air Balloon
products.shortDescription: Hot Air Balloon Flight with Champagne Breakfast
products.description:
05.00am (Time varies seasonally and with your location)

Pick up from selected Gold Coast hotels or one of our convenient meeting points - Nerang or Canungra. Air conditioned coach transfers to our Hot Air Balloon launch site.  Your confirmed Pickup/Meeting time will be issued as soon as you Reserve your booking. Our team of pilots are Australia's most experienced with the record for most reliable balloon ride take-offs in the southern hemisphere. Always a surprise, always an impressive sight. Arrive at the launch site, to see the amazing hot air balloon inflation display. Did you know, our hot air balloons stand taller than a ten storey building?

07.00 - 07.30 am

A great team of pilots, expert, knowledgeable & great guys are guiding your balloon.  They have some amazing facts to share about Hot Air Ballooning. Your balloon crew driver is ready and waiting to answer all your questions and have a bit of fun.  We're pleased to say our team are a fun and highly trained crew are well practiced in maximising the enjoyment to be had.  After landing there is some Hot Air Balloon pack-up games and lots of laughs.

08.00 - 09.15 am

Come down to earth and it's a short drive to O'Reilly's Grand Homestead & Boutique Vineyard.  Our breakfast is a real highlight!  We have exclusive access to O'Reillys Canungra Valley Vineyard- take a sneak peak at our virtual tour  Relax in the historic surroundings with a glass of champagne to toast your morning.  Enjoy a delicious, fresh breakfast as you relax in the serenity of the vineyard on the verandah of this picturesque grand Queenslander.

09.45 - 10.30 am

Air conditioned coach transfers to your Meeting Point.  We also offer drop offs to Theme Parks, Shopping Centres & link with a number Gold Coast Hinterland tours.  Just let us know where you would like your drop off when calling our Reservations office.

products.name: Husk Distillery - Unlimited Hop on Hop off Day Pass - Southern Gold Coast / Northern NSW
products.shortDescription: Explore Southern Gold Coast and Northern NSW with our Hop on Hop off Bus! Visit Husk Distillery, Burleigh Heads National Park, Northern Rivers Rail Trail,  Tropical Fruit World, and more, Unlimited Hop on Hop off pass to all attractions.
products.description:
Create Your Own Adventure: Southern Gold Coast & Northern NSW Hop on Hop off Bus


Experience the ultimate freedom to explore the Southern Gold Coast and Northern New South Wales at your own pace with our Hop on Hop off Bus service. Operating every Monday and Friday, this flexible transportation option allows you unlimited access to a variety of attractions, from pristine beaches and national parks to cultural centres and gourmet destinations.


How It Works

• Unlimited Access: Enjoy unlimited hopping on and off between all listed attractions throughout the day.

• Convenient Pickups: Departures from various Gold Coast locations make it easy to start your adventure.

• Flexible Scheduling: Spend as much or as little time as you like at each stop. Simply catch the next bus when you’re ready to move on.


Featured Attractions


Currumbin Wildlife Sanctuary

Discover Australian Wildlife

Get up close with Australia’s unique animals at Currumbin Wildlife Sanctuary. Hand-feed kangaroos, cuddle a koala, and watch exciting wildlife shows. The sanctuary also features a high ropes adventure course for thrill-seekers.

• Highlights: Wildlife encounters, bird shows, TreeTop Challenge

• Ideal For: Families, animal lovers, adventure enthusiasts


Jellurgal Aboriginal Cultural Centre

Immerse in Indigenous Culture

Learn about the rich Aboriginal history of the Gold Coast at Jellurgal. Guided tours offer insights into Dreamtime stories, bush tucker, and the significance of the land.

• Highlights: Guided cultural walks, art gallery, storytelling

• Ideal For: Cultural enthusiasts, history buffs, educational groups


Burleigh Heads National Park

Nature’s Coastal Gem

Explore walking trails that weave through rainforest and offer stunning ocean views. Perfect for a leisurely hike or a picnic by the sea.

• Highlights: Coastal walks, wildlife spotting, panoramic viewpoints

• Ideal For: Nature lovers, hikers, photographers


Tropical Fruit World

A Feast for the Senses

Discover exotic fruits from around the world. Enjoy guided tours, fruit tastings, and family-friendly activities like mini-golf and farm animal encounters.

• Highlights: Fruit plantation tours, tastings, orchard discovery walks

• Ideal For: Foodies, families, horticulture enthusiasts


Catch a Crab

An Unforgettable River Adventure

Experience the Tweed River like never before. Participate in crab catching, oyster farming, and pelican feeding aboard a fun-filled cruise.

• Highlights: Crab catching, fishing, river cruise

• Ideal For: Adventure seekers, families, seafood lovers


The Spa at Salt

Relax and Rejuvenate

Indulge in luxurious spa treatments that will leave you refreshed. Choose from massages, facials, and wellness packages.

• Highlights: Spa treatments, wellness programs, relaxation lounges

• Ideal For: Couples, solo travellers needing relaxation, spa enthusiasts


Husk Distillery

Sip and Savour Local Spirits

Visit the home of Ink Gin and Husk Rum. Enjoy distillery tours, tastings, and a relaxing time in the cellar door and café overlooking the countryside.

• Highlights: Distillery tours, spirit tastings, scenic views

• Ideal For: Adults, spirit connoisseurs, those interested in craft distilling


Northern Rivers Rail Trail

Explore the Hinterland

Walk or cycle along the historic rail corridor, taking in the natural beauty and charm of the Northern Rivers region.

• Highlights: Scenic trails, heritage sites, outdoor exercise

• Ideal For: Cyclists, walkers, history enthusiasts


Murwillumbah

Artistic Heart of the Region

Discover local art at the Tweed Regional Gallery and Margaret Olley Art Centre. Stroll through the town’s vibrant streets filled with cafés, boutiques, and galleries.

• Highlights: Art galleries, shopping, dining

• Ideal For: Art lovers, shoppers, cultural explorers


Why Choose Our Hop on Hop off Bus?

• Customise Your Day: Tailor your itinerary to suit your interests.

• Comfort and Convenience: Travel in comfort without worrying about parking or navigation.

• Local Knowledge: Our friendly drivers can provide tips and information about each destination.


Booking Information

• Operating Days: Every Monday and Friday

• Pick-Up Locations: Multiple points across the Gold Coast

• Tickets: Available for purchase online or at select outlets


Embark on a journey where you hold the map. Whether you’re seeking adventure, relaxation, or cultural enrichment, the Southern Gold Coast and Northern NSW Hop on Hop off Bus offers a gateway to unforgettable experiences. Book your seat today and start creating your own adventure!


*This ticket is for bus transfers only and doesn’t include a Booking at any venues or attractions

Whether you're exploring the stunning beaches of the Gold Coast, the lush hinterlands of Tamborine Mountain, or the vibrant cityscapes of Brisbane, our premium SUV offers a smooth and sustainable journey. Perfect for corporate events, special occasions, or a relaxing day out, our service ensures a memorable and environmentally conscious travel experience. Book now and enjoy the best of South East Queensland with our top-of-the-line Hybrid or EV SUV charter.

Discover local art at the Tweed Regional Gallery and Margaret Olley Art Centre. Stroll through the town’s vibrant streets filled with cafés, boutiques, and galleries.

• Highlights: Art galleries, shopping, dining

• Ideal For: Art lovers, shoppers, cultural explorers

Embark on a journey where you hold the map. Whether you’re seeking adventure, relaxation, or cultural enrichment, the Southern Gold Coast and Northern NSW Hop on Hop off Bus offers a gateway to unforgettable experiences. Book your seat today and start creating your own adventure!

products.name: Jet Ski Safaris + Beer - Gold Coast - Visit Islands in the Broadwater and Gold Coasts best Breweries
products.shortDescription:
Looking for something different to do for your Bucks Party , Birthday or Special occasion? 
This tour is great for those wanting to do something a bit different. 
The tour includes  1.5Hr Jetski Safari followed by a boutique brewery tour
products.description:
Jet Ski Safari and Beer tour includes


• Private brewery Tour for just your group
• New Luxury Vehicles
• 90 Minutes Jet Ski Safari - One Ski Per Person

• Visit Gold Coast's best Craft Breweries

• Local Beer Tasting included at each venue

• Lunch included

• Relaxed and Fun Guides

• 1-4 People can Travel in a Luxury SUV

• Larger Groups will travel in a Luxury Minibus or Coach

• Perfect for dates, social outings, birthdays, bucks, hens or even corporate events


Tour is 1.5 hrs -  40klm Jet ski 

Blast your way along the beautiful sub tropical shores of South Stradbroke Island.

We head North for a good 20 km weaving our way up past beautiful Islands, beaches sandbars and through mangroves where we then stop at a beautiful tropical bar on South Stradbroke Island for refreshments before turning back to ride the 20 km home.

On a Saturday or Sunday morning, we give an extended stay and if desired you can purchase breakfast at the island at your own cost. 

Or grab a bite from the Marina, on your return.


Requirements for bookings:

  • you must be willing to sign a waiver

  • Guests to make own way to Jetskis - Wharf  for  7:30am Arrival

  • Bus will pick you up at the conclusion of the Jet Ski at approximately 11am 

  • Please bring a towel and a dry change of clothes to change into before getting on the bus

  • NO ALCOHOL Is to be consumed prior to riding of Jet Ski's 


    Are you looking for a unique and luxurious experience in Queensland? Look no further than Pineapple Tours! Our luxury Jetski + Beer tour is the perfect way to explore the best breweries in the region while enjoying the highest level of comfort and service.

    After your 90 Minute Jetski Safari to the Islands there is time to put on something dry before our tour begins with a pick-up from the marina in a luxury vehicle. From there, we will take you to some of the best breweries in the region, where you can sample some of the finest craft beers and learn about the history and culture of the area. You will also have the opportunity to purchase some of the beers you have sampled.

    During the tour, you will be able to relax and enjoy the scenery as you travel through the beautiful city landscape and oceanside. You will also have the chance to take in the stunning views of the surrounding landscape.

    During your tour, you will be treated to a delicious lunch at one of the breweries, where you can enjoy the food and beer while taking in area. After the tour, you will be taken back to your hotel or accommodation in the luxury vehicle.









    If you are looking for a unique and luxurious experience in Queensland, then look no further than Pineapple Tours. Our luxury brewery tour is the perfect way to explore the best breweries in the region while enjoying the highest level of comfort and service. Book your tour today and experience the best of Queensland!

products.shortDescription: Hire and ride your own jet ski and feel the freedom and extreme exhilaration that Jet Ski Safaris has to offer as you explore the wild blue yonder and the hidden islands of Surfers Paradise and the Gold Coast in Beautiful Queensland.
products.description:
It doesn’t get better than this... Let us introduce you to the most unique, specialised and exciting experience on the Gold Coast! Hire and ride your own jet ski and feel the freedom and extreme exhilaration that Jet Ski Safaris has to offer as you explore the wild blue yonder and the hidden islands of Surfers Paradise and the Gold Coast in beautiful Queensland.

Meet the local dolphins, turtles and wallabies that inhabit this wonderful Jet Ski paradise here on the Gold Coast. Stop off at a tropical Island resort on South Stradbroke Island for a break where you can have a splash, something delicious to eat and a nice cold beverage. With big hairpin bends and Aussie flora and fauna around every turn, it’s a ride that you’ll never forget!

For the ultimate water sport & jet ski hire, choose Gold Coast’s number 1 service, Jet Ski Safaris!

products.name: Local Hopper - Tamborine Mountain
products.shortDescription: Shuttle Service to key tourist attractions and venues on Tamborine Mountain - Pickup from Tamborine Mountain
products.description:
This ticket is for pickup from the Top of Tamborine Mountain only


Create Your Own Adventure: Tamborine Mountain Hop on Hop off Bus

Experience the beauty and charm of Tamborine Mountain with our flexible Hop on Hop off Bus service. Operating daily, this convenient transportation option allows you unlimited access to the mountain’s top attractions. Whether you’re a nature lover, foodie, or adventure seeker, tailor your day to suit your interests.

How It Works

•Unlimited Access: Hop on and off as many times as you like throughout the day.

•Convenient Pickups: Start your journey from various Brisbane locations.

•Flexible Scheduling: Spend as much time as you want at each stop. Catch the next bus when you’re ready to move on.

 

Featured Attractions – Please look at the Map in the image Gallery to see all attractions.

 

 

Tamborine Rainforest Skywalk

Walk Among the Treetops

Experience the rainforest like never before on the Tamborine Rainforest Skywalk. This eco-adventure takes you on a 1.5 km walk through the beautiful middle and upper canopies of the rainforest.

•Highlights: Skywalk bridge, cantilever bridge, Cedar Creek viewing platform

•Ideal For: Nature enthusiasts, families, photographers

 

Glow Worm Caves Tamborine Mountain

A Magical Underground Experience

Visit the Glow Worm Caves at Cedar Creek Estate and witness thousands of glowing creatures lighting up the darkness in a purpose-built cave.

•Highlights: Guided tours, glow worm viewing, Cedar Creek Estate Winery

•Ideal For: Families, nature lovers, educational trips

 

Gallery Walk Tamborine Mountain

Shopping and Dining Haven

Stroll down Gallery Walk, Tamborine Mountain’s famous strip of boutiques, art galleries, cafés, and speciality shops offering everything from local arts to delicious fudge.

•Highlights: Shopping, art galleries, dining options

•Ideal For: Shoppers, art enthusiasts, foodies

 

Witches Falls Winery

Sip Award-Winning Wines

Enjoy wine tastings at Queensland’s oldest continuously operating winery. Relax in the cellar door or picnic among the vineyards.

•Highlights: Wine tasting, cheese platters, vineyard views

•Ideal For: Wine lovers, couples, groups

 

Cedar Creek Estate Vineyard & Winery

Wine, Art, and More

Visit Cedar Creek Estate for wine tasting, stroll through the art gallery, or enjoy a meal at the restaurant overlooking the lake.

•Highlights: Wine tasting, restaurant, art gallery, Glow Worm Caves

•Ideal For: Wine enthusiasts, families, art lovers

 

Tamborine Mountain Distillery

Award-Winning Spirits

Discover handcrafted liqueurs and spirits at Australia’s most internationally awarded distillery. Taste unique flavours and learn about the distilling process.

•Highlights: Spirit and liqueur tastings, distillery tours, gift shop

•Ideal For: Spirit connoisseurs, adults, those interested in craft distilling

 

Tamborine Mountain Glades – Previously Thunderbird Park

Adventure in Nature

Experience a range of activities including high ropes courses at the TreeTop Challenge, laser skirmish, mini-golf, and gemstone fossicking.

•Highlights: Adventure activities, camping, horse riding

•Ideal For: Families, adventure seekers, groups

 

Curtis Falls

Serene Waterfall Walk

Take a tranquil walk through lush rainforest to the beautiful Curtis Falls. Enjoy the sights and sounds of nature along the way.

•Highlights: Rainforest walk, waterfall viewing, birdwatching

•Ideal For: Nature lovers, photographers, hikers

 

Fortitude Brewing Company

Craft Beers and Good Times

Relax with a cold craft beer at the local brewery. Enjoy a variety of brews in a friendly atmosphere.

•Highlights: Craft beer tastings, live music events

•Ideal For: Beer enthusiasts, groups, casual dining

 

Tamborine Mountain Botanic Gardens

Flora Paradise

Explore 11 hectares of beautiful gardens showcasing both native and exotic plants. Perfect for a peaceful stroll or a picnic.

•Highlights: Themed gardens, lake, picnic areas

•Ideal For: Garden enthusiasts, families, relaxation

Why Choose Our Hop on Hop off Bus?

•Customise Your Day: Create an itinerary that matches your interests.

•Comfort and Convenience: Avoid the hassle of driving and parking.

•Local Insights: Friendly drivers provide tips and local knowledge.

 

Booking Information

•Operating Days: Daily

•Pick-Up Locations: Various points across Brisbane

•Tickets: Purchase online or at select outlets

Embark on a journey tailored by you. From breathtaking natural sights to culinary delights and thrilling adventures, the Tamborine Mountain Hop on Hop off Bus is your key to an unforgettable day. Book your ticket today and start exploring!

*This ticket is for hop on hop off shuttle transfers only and doesn’t include entry to an attractions


Meet at any of the locations on the map and the bus will travel around the mountain once every hour, tickets must be booked in advance.


If you need to be picked up in Brisbane use this link

Hop on Hop Off Bus - Tamborine Mountain - From Brisbane

If you need to be picked up in Gold Coast use this link
Hop on Hop Off Bus - Tamborine Mountain - from Gold Coast


TAMBORINE MOUNTAIN MAP

products.shortDescription:
Looking for something different to do for your Bucks Party , Birthday or Special occasion? 
This tour is great for those wanting to do something out of the ordinary
Tour includes  2 Hours of Axe Throwing followed by 3 Breweries and Lunch
products.description:
Axe throwing and Beer tour includes


• Private Tour for just your group
• New Luxury Vehicles
• 90 Minutes Axe Throwing Session
• Visit Three Craft Breweries
• Relaxed and Fun Guides
• Lunch included
• Beer Tasting at each venue (Premium Package only)
• We have four Brewery Tour options in Brisbane 
Choose from North, South, East and West in the comments or speak to our bookings team



Perfect for dates, social outings, birthdays, bucks, hens or even corporate events, sessions are led by expert coaches who will get you nailing bullseyes in no time.
Connect with your inner viking and learn how to throw an axe with some of Australias best axe coaches.
After this we will quench your hard earned thirsts with a good cold beer and the best cold beer is for you to decide while visiting three of the best craft breweries the Gold Coast has to offer.
All tours with Pineapple Tours are designed to be fun, relaxed days out and our guides are trained to be part of the group to help you make the most of your experience.







Requirements for bookings:

  • You must be over 18
  • A minor between the ages of 14-17 with a parent or legal guardian co-signing, present and participating in the session. (Minor will not be able to consume alcohol in the breweries)
  • you must be willing to sign a waiver
  • All participants must wear enclosed shoes
  • Not intoxicated prior to axe throwing
  • Not more than 20 weeks pregnant

products.name: Luxury Escapes Personalised Experience - From the Gold Coast
products.shortDescription:
What is Slow and Low? 
Slow down, Relax and Lower your Stress
Take a break and get out of the daily routine, shed our worries and fears and visit some of the most spectacular places that the Gold Coast and Byron Bay have to offer.
products.description:
Please call us on 0466331232 or email us at bookings@pineappletours.com.au to confirm availability before booking.
We do have multiple buses so sometimes we can run an extra bus when it says we are fully booked.

Byron Bay Slow and Low Tour Includes:

- Pickup and Drop off from your home/hotel or Airbnb

- Gourmet Breakfast/Lunch, Complimentary Beverage with lunch - All Dietary needs can be catered for.

- Personalised Experience

- Secluded Beaches and/or Day Spa Visit

- Sightseeing - Byron Bay Township, Cape Byron Lighthouse

- Short Scenic Walks - Optional

- Eco friendly

- Massage - Optional



We've designed the perfect day just for you, this tour is not only for the discerning traveller but also for locals that just need a short break and with us one day is all you need to truly wind down and relax.
Our goal is not just to provide an excellent tour experience but we want you to feel that you are being shown around by a family member or a friend of the family.
Each and every experience will be completely personalised to suit your needs and can be adjusted as needed throughout the day and all of our vehicles are new and air conditioned.

Byron Bay is a 1-1.5Hr drive from the Gold Coast depending on which hotel you are staying and it has beautiful scenery of rolling green hills and valleys carved from a dormant volcano.

To start we can do a bit of sightseeing and go for a cruise over to Wategos Beach and Cape Byron Lighthouse, this is the most easterly point of Australia and the shades of blue that you see here a like no other place in the world. There are regularly dolphins, Seals and also Whales can be seen from the cliffs in Whale Season*. Here there is also a short 15 min Scenic walk from Cape Byron Lighthouse to Wategos Beach and you are welcome to walk down and we can pick you up at the bottom.

What is the perfect day out without the perfect lunch? We have gone to great efforts to find you the best food experiences that money can buy we can give you a few options to choose from on the day or let us surprise you with the best of the best culinary delights.

After lunch, if you prefer the beach we will head down to one of the many secluded beaches that span the shores of the candescent blue coastline, otherwise if you prefer we can head to one of the most fantastic day spas where you can experience hot and cold plunge pools, steam rooms, Saunas and you also have time for a massage*

Now it's the afternoon and if you would like we can sample a selection of locally owned/made beers at either Stone and Wood Brewery or Byron Bay Brewing Co otherwise if you prefer something stronger there are also several Distilleries in Byron Bay that we can visit.

On the way home if you would like to take a scenic route and visit some more special beaches on the way home we will be more than happy to oblige. Feel free to ask us about our dinner recommendations once we get back to the Gold Coast because what would the perfect day out be without the perfect dinner?


*Massage is an optional extra please let us know on booking so that we can make sure that there is availability.

*Whale Watching Season will be from late May to early November and will bring over 20,000 Humpback Whales past the spectacular coastline of Byron Bay and right beside the Gold Coast beaches. The Whales migrate north from Antarctica into the warm waters of North Queensland in the early months and return with calves in the later months.

Please call us on 0466331232 or email us at bookings@pineappletours.com.au to confirm availability before booking.
We do have multiple buses so sometimes we can run an extra bus when it says we are fully booked.

products.name: Luxury Honeymoon Experience
products.shortDescription: A Private tour of the Scenic Rim and taste some of Queensland's best produce, with a gourmet lunch at one of the best restaurants in the region, a chance to meet a camel and private unique adventures along the way.
products.description:
Are you looking for a romantic and unforgettable honeymoon experience in Queensland? Look no further than Pineapple Tours! 

Our Signature Honeymoon Experience is designed to pamper and indulge you in luxury, creating beautiful memories that will last a lifetime.

Your journey begins with a private pick-up from your hotel or accommodation in a luxurious vehicle. 

From the moment you are picked up, you'll be immersed in comfort and style, setting the tone for your honeymoon adventure.

As you embark on this personalised journey, we'll take you to explore the breathtaking beauty of the Gold Coast and Surrounds while visiting, trendy cafes, local farms or local providores in the area.



We will deliver experiences that you can't buy on your own and our guides will give you an informative commentary throughout the day.

Immerse yourselves in the flavours of the region as you sample the finest local produce and learn about the rich history and culture together.

Throughout the tour, you can relax and enjoy the scenic views as you travel through the picturesque landscape. We can customise the itinerary to include visits to romantic spots, such as secluded lookouts, where you can take in the stunning vistas and create magical moments together and possibly take some memorable photos.

After a day of exploration and culinary delights, we'll ensure you're treated to a sumptuous dinner at one of the region's finest gourmet restaurants. Savor exquisite dishes while toasting to your love amidst a backdrop of stunning views.

At the end of the day, you'll be transported back to your hotel or accommodation in our luxury vehicle, allowing you to unwind and reflect on the beautiful moments shared during your honeymoon tour.

And because we understand that this is a special time for you as a couple, we've curated additional services to make your honeymoon even more memorable. Upon your return to the hotel, you'll be greeted with a beautifully prepared hot bath adorned with fragrant rose petals, creating an atmosphere of pure romance and relaxation. To celebrate your love, a chilled bottle of champagne and delectable chocolates will be waiting for you, adding a touch of luxury and indulgence to your evening.

To make your reservation for this enchanting honeymoon experience, please contact us at 0466331232 or email us at bookings@pineappletours.com.au. 

We will tailor the experience to your preferences.

Indulge in the romance of Queensland's Scenic Rim with Pineapple Tours, and let us create the honeymoon of your dreams. Congratulations on your marriage, and we look forward to creating unforgettable memories with you both.



For the Extra Service we do require that you are staying with one of our hotel partners that are able to provide this service.

Brisbane

- Emporium Brisbane

Gold Coast

- JW Marriott

- The Langham Gold Coast

- Palazzo Versace



  • Unique Experience

  • Extra Service provided in your hotel after your tour.

  • Private Tour Guide

  • Luxury Vehicles

  • All Inclusive

  • Only the best Food

  • Gourmet food and local produce

  • Lunch and Dinner Provided

  • Scenic Lookouts along the way

  • Door to Door Service

  • We offer pick up return all Hotels and Suburbs*  Gold Coast & Brisbane

  • – Brand New Luxury Vehicles - Flagship Luxury SUV

Please call us on 0466331232 or email us at bookings@pineappletours.com.au to confirm availability before booking.

products.description:
Please call us on 0466331232 or email us at bookings@pineappletours.com.au to confirm availability before booking.


TOUR INCLUDES

- All Inclusive Bespoke Experience designed just for your group

- Private Tour Guide
– Guided Tastings at Local Providores in the region
– A delicious two-course Gourmet lunch - Complimentary beverages
– Gourmet Cheese platters

- A Guided Tour of a local distillery or brewery - your choice (we can replace this with another activity for non drinkers)

- Tour through the Villages and arts and culture of the Northern NSW and the Tweed Valley

- Sightseeing - Tweed Valley - Hinterland - Township

- Short Scenic Walks - Optional

– Scenic Lookouts along the way
– Photos of your day
- Eco Friendly
– Door to door Service with pickup and drop off from your home/hotel or airbnb

- Our team will reach out and personalise this tour to suit your group

- Brand New Luxury Vehicles ( Luxury SUV for 1-4 people - Luxury Bus for larger groups )

Please call us on 0466331232 or email us at bookings@pineappletours.com.au to confirm availability before booking.


Stretching inland from through the dormant volcano of the Tweed Valley, Northern NSW is filled with gorgeous villages, stunning scenery and a tranquillity that washes urban stresses from every visitor. Taste Local Produce along the way.


We've designed the perfect day just for you, this tour is not only for the discerning traveller but also for locals that just need a short break and with us one day is all you need to truly wind down and relax.
Our goal is not just to provide an excellent tour experience but we want you to feel that you are being shown around by a family member or a friend of the family.
Each and every experience will be completely personalised to suit your needs and can be adjusted as needed throughout the day and all of our vehicles are new and air conditioned.

Northern NSW is a short scenic drive from the Gold Coast and it has beautiful scenery of rolling green hills and valleys carved from a dormant volcano.

To start we can do a bit of sightseeing on the way, choose from a quick trip down the highway and get straight to the Gourmet Food that we have prepared or we can take the backroads everywhere and stop in the small towns of Murwillumbah, Mooball and Cudgen for some street side shopping and coffee along the way.

After this go for a cruise over through the hinterland for some cheese tasting and wine, this is right next to Mooball National Park with beauty that you see here a like no other place in the world. 

What is the perfect day out without the perfect lunch? We have gone to great efforts to find you the best food experiences that money can buy we can give you a few options to choose from on the day or let us surprise you with the best of the best culinary delights.

After lunch, if you prefer the beach we will head down to one of the many secluded beaches that span the shores of the candescent blue coastline, otherwise if you prefer we can head to another local providore for some more tastings

Now it's the afternoon and if you would like we can sample a selection of locally owned/made beers at either Stone and Wood Brewery or Byron Bay Brewing Co otherwise if you prefer something stronger there are also several Distilleries in the Tweed Valley Husk Distillers - Famous for their Ink Gin and agricole Rum.

On the way home if you would like to take a scenic route and visit some more special beaches on the way home we will be more than happy to oblige. Feel free to ask us about our dinner recommendations once we get back to the Gold Coast because what would the perfect day out be without the perfect dinner?

*Whale Watching Season will be from late May to early November and will bring over 20,000 Humpback Whales past the spectacular coastline of NSW and right beside the Gold Coast beaches. The Whales migrate north from Antarctica into the warm waters of North Queensland in the early months and return with calves in the later months.


This tour is personalised by our team and they will reach out to you once you've booked to confirm your preferred itinerary on the day.

Please call us on 0466331232 or email us at bookings@pineappletours.com.au to confirm availability before booking.

products.shortDescription:
Visiting 3 Venues with Tastings and enjoy a sumptuous High Tea 
 Call us if you would like to customise this tour.
products.description:
Please call us on 0466331232 or email us at bookings@pineappletours.com.au to confirm availability before booking.

WINE TOUR INCLUDES
– Guided Tastings at 3 destinations

– A Delicious High Tea 

- Sparkling Wine with the High Tea and Bottomless Tea/ Coffee 

– Scenic Lookouts along the way

– Cheese platter (optional)

– Door to door Service*


Experience the endless picturesque views from the Gold Coast to the unique wine trails of Mt Tamborine. For a unique opportunity to pleasure your senses by tasting a hand-picked

selection of wines produced by seasoned wine makers and award-winning boutique wineries along the way, allow Pineapple Tours to be your guide.

We are primed to cater for all your transportation needs from your accommodations through the winding valleys of the Gold Coast to the famous Tambourine Mountain.

As we move through the valley, your senses will be stimulated by picturesque mountain views, breathtaking landscapes and fresh mountain air as you anticipate exploring the trails

that lie ahead.

We will make stops at a number of family-run wineries where you can excite your palates with guided tastings of between 6-10 varieties of wine during each stop.

High Tea includes - A beautiful selection of fresh sandwiches and warm savouries. Freshly baked plain and sultana scones served with strawberry jam and cream.                                                   An array of sweets ranging from delicate cakes, slices and tartlets to mini cheesecakes, bliss balls and macarons, topped of with fresh berries.

Afterwards, to satisfy your sweet-tooth, you can also sample some of the delicious fudge at Granny Macs. Pineapple tours is all about making your wine tour

dreams come true.

Our guides are well-trained, efficient, entertaining and love sharing their knowledge of the sights, sounds and history of Tamborine Mountain. Our chauffeured mini-bus service includes

door to door pick-up and drop-off from Gold Coast or Brisbane 


* Tour Itinerary may change depending on venue trading days, weddings and functions

products.shortDescription: As Brisbane locals we know all of the best spots to visit from Brisbane city to the vast hinterland and we are here to guide you. Join us on the best sightseeing experience the Gold Coast has to offer in our new air conditioned buses
products.description:

- Private Tour for just your group
- Pickup and Drop off from your Hotel or accommodation
- Snacks and Water throughout the day

- Lunch
- Scenic Views
- Visit the places only the locals know about.

- Flexible Schedule so you can relax and not feel rushed
- New buses
- Knowledgeable guides

Duration 5-6 Hrs - available 7 days a week


We will pick you up from your home or hotel and take you on a journey outside of the city. We will contact you once the tour has been booked to get an idea of the types of activities that you like and we will create a tour to suit your needs.


This is not your typical tour, our goal is not to run the same old tour everyday but to make you feel as if you are being shown around by a friend or family member to places that even some locals don't know about.


This tour can be personalised to suit your preferred itinerary so if there are places that you'd like to see please let us know so we can include this in your itinerary

products.name: Outback Camel Farm Tour and Tasting - Private Tour
products.shortDescription: A Private tour of the Scenic Rim and taste some of Queensland's best produce, with a gourmet lunch at a local restaurant, a chance to meet a camel and private unique adventures along the way.
products.description:
Outback Camel Farm Tour: Experience the Best of Queensland


Choose Your Group Size for Tailored Pricing


Highlights:


Unique Experience: Dive into the heart of the scenic rim with our curated experiences.

Private Tour Guide: Benefit from personalised insights and stories from a local guide.

Guided Tastings: Savor the flavors of Queensland at each venue.

Gourmet Lunch: Indulge in a delectable meal at the renowned Harrisville pub.

Cheese Lovers: Relish exquisite gourmet cheese platters.

Camel Adventure: Enjoy a memorable camel tour and tasting at Summerland Camels.

Nature's Beauty: Take in breathtaking scenic lookouts during your journey.

Eco-Conscious: Travel with a clear conscience knowing our tour is eco-friendly.

Door-to-Door Service: Enjoy hassle-free commutes with our door-to-door service*.

Travel in Style: Experience comfort in our brand-new minibuses.


Embark on a private exploration of Queensland's scenic rim. Taste some of the region's finest produce, enjoy a gourmet lunch at a local hotspot, and immerse yourself in unique adventures, including a chance to meet and learn about camels. Join us for a day of wonder, flavours, and memories.


Itinerary:


Meet your private guide and board our brand-new minibus from a designated pickup point in Brisbane or the Gold Coast. Get comfortable and enjoy the scenic drive as we head toward the scenic rim.


Experience the unique allure of camels at Summerland. Engage in a fun and informative tour, meet these majestic creatures, and even get a chance to taste camel milk products. Dive deep into the history, benefits, and charm of camels.

For those with a palate for fine camel cheese, this segment is a treat. Sample a range of camel products, learning about their origin, production process, and the ideal pairings.


Head to the iconic Harrisville pub, where a delicious lunch awaits. Choose from a variety of dishes, each reflecting the local flavours and culinary expertise of Queensland.


Post-lunch, embark on a scenic drive, stopping at handpicked lookouts. These spots offer panoramic views of the scenic rim, perfect for photos and to breathe in the fresh countryside air.


Our commitment to eco-friendly tours means we not only show you nature’s beauty, but also share insights on the region's ecology, conservation efforts, and how you can make a difference.


As we drive back to Brisbane or the Gold Coast, reminisce about the day's adventures. Our door-to-door service ensures you're dropped off right where we picked you up, concluding a day filled with memories, flavours, and unique experiences.

products.name: Premium Boutique Winery Tour - Brisbane Pickup (limited to 6 per tour)
products.shortDescription: A tour of award winning wineries in Mount Tamborine and taste some of Queensland's best wines including guided tastings at a number of family owned boutique wineries, a two course lunch, cheese tasting with all of the trimmings
products.description:
WINE TOUR INCLUDES

- Premium Experience (Maximum 6 per tour)
- Guided Tastings at each venue
- Fudge tasting 
- Cheese Tasting
- Glass of Wine With Lunch
- A two course gourmet lunch by an award winning chef at a winery
- Scenic Lookouts along the way
- Photos of your day
- Newest vehicles
- Eco Friendly
- Door to door Service*

Pickup 9:00 am - Drop Off 5:00 pm


Premium Boutique Winery Tour by Pineapple Tours

Tour Description

This exclusive tour is designed for couples and small boutique groups, offering an intimate and luxurious experience with a maximum of six people per tour. Departure is guaranteed for a minimum of two people per booking.


Venues We visit 4 venues on the day from the list below (Tour is updated regularly to ensure that you receive the best experience available):

  • Cedar Creek Estate

  • Hampton Estate

  • Witches Falls Winery

  • Tamborine Mountain Distillery

  • Gallery Walk

Duration Pickup: 8:30 am – 9:00 am
Drop Off: 5:30 pm (Approx.)


Experience the Pinnacle of Wine Touring in Queensland

Are you seeking an exclusive and opulent wine experience in Queensland? Look no further than Pineapple Tours! Our Premium Boutique Winery Tour offers a unique opportunity to explore the region’s finest wineries in a private and luxurious setting.

Your journey begins with a luxurious minibus pick-up directly from your hotel or accommodation. With our expert guides, you’ll visit some of the region’s premier wineries, where you can savour the finest wines and learn about the area’s rich history and culture. You’ll also have the chance to purchase some of the exceptional wines you taste.

Throughout the day, relax and take in the picturesque landscapes of Mount Tamborine’s stunning countryside. You’ll also visit local attractions, including historic towns and villages, all while enjoying breathtaking views of the surrounding terrain.

As part of this premium experience, a delectable two-course gourmet lunch will be served at one of the wineries, allowing you to indulge in exquisite cuisine paired with exceptional wines.

This tour includes visits to four outstanding venues, featuring a variety of boutique wineries and a tasting experience at Tamborine Mountain Distillery, where you can sample their renowned liquors, gins, and rums.


Inclusions:

  • Intimate tour group limited to six people for a personalised experience.

  • Luxury pick-up and return from all hotels and suburbs in Brisbane City and surrounding areas.*

  • Visits to four premier venues, including boutique wineries and the Tamborine Mountain Distillery.

  • Gourmet two-course lunch at one of the wineries.

  • Expert guides offering insights into the region’s history and wine culture.

*Some outer suburbs may incur a surcharge.



Book Your Premium Experience Today

If you’re looking for a unique and luxurious wine tour in Queensland, Pineapple Tours is your ultimate choice. Secure your spot today and immerse yourself in the very best that Queensland’s wine country has to offer!

Contact Us

  • Phone: 0466 331 232

  • Email: bookings@pineappletours.com.au

Itinerary may change depending on winery opening hours, weddings, and functions.

Tour Description

This exclusive tour is designed for couples and small boutique groups, offering an intimate and luxurious experience with a maximum of six people per tour. Departure is guaranteed for a minimum of two people per booking.


Venues We visit 4 venues on the day from the list below (Tour is updated regularly to ensure that you receive the best experience available):

  • Hampton Estate

  • Witches Falls Winery

  • Tamborine Mountain Distillery

  • Gallery Walk

Duration Pickup: 8:30 am – 9:00 am
Drop Off: 5:30 pm (Approx.)


Experience the Pinnacle of Wine Touring in Queensland

Are you seeking an exclusive and opulent wine experience in Queensland? Look no further than Pineapple Tours! Our Premium Boutique Winery Tour offers a unique opportunity to explore the region’s finest wineries in a private and luxurious setting.

Your journey begins with a luxurious minibus pick-up directly from your hotel or accommodation. With our expert guides, you’ll visit some of the region’s premier wineries, where you can savour the finest wines and learn about the area’s rich history and culture. You’ll also have the chance to purchase some of the exceptional wines you taste.

Throughout the day, relax and take in the picturesque landscapes of Mount Tamborine’s stunning countryside. You’ll also visit local attractions, including historic towns and villages, all while enjoying breathtaking views of the surrounding terrain.

As part of this premium experience, a delectable two-course gourmet lunch will be served at one of the wineries, allowing you to indulge in exquisite cuisine paired with exceptional wines.

This tour includes visits to four outstanding venues, featuring a variety of boutique wineries and a tasting experience at Tamborine Mountain Distillery, where you can sample their renowned liquors, gins, and rums.


Inclusions:

  • Intimate tour group limited to six people for a personalised experience.

  • Luxury pick-up and return from all hotels and suburbs in Gold Coast and surrounding areas.*

  • Visits to four premier venues, including boutique wineries and the Tamborine Mountain Distillery.

  • Gourmet two-course lunch at one of the wineries.

  • Expert guides offering insights into the region’s history and wine culture.

*Some outer suburbs may incur a surcharge.

products.name: Premium Winery Tour + Party on YOT Club
products.shortDescription:
Looking for something different to do for your Hen's Party , Birthday or Special occasion? 
Tour includes Premium Half Day Mt Tamborine Winery Tour and finish with a party on the YOT Club
products.description:
Premium Half Day Winery Tour and YOT CLUB


• Visiting 3 Wineries on Mt Tamborine with Guided Tastings

• Two Course Gourmet Lunch

Private Wine Tour for just your group

• Your Choice of YOT CLUB Party - Main Deck or Upper Deck

• VIP Booth Package Options

• New Luxury Vehicles
• Relaxed and Fun Guides


Please note you will make your own way home after the YOT Event.


For Larger Groups it is best to call before booking online


The YOT CLUB is the World's First Super Yacht Entertainment Venue.

Spread over two palatial levels with two full service cocktail bars, the YOT Club has been designed from the “water up” as the ultimate 40 metre luxury lounge bar. Grab your crew to watch the world go by as you indulge in seasonal cocktails and mouth-watering food from our on-board executive chef. 

Let the smooth sounds of our resident DJ’s set the mood as we cruise into a dreamy summer sunset. 

Purchase a general admission ticket or take your experience to the next level with a private booth and enjoy the VIP treatment. 

 

Upcoming  Gold Coast Departure Dates 

All Saturdays in January 2022

February -  Saturday 5th, 19th, 26th 


Tour  Options

Standard Package   $210pp-  Wine Tour and Main Deck Entry 

Half Day Wine Tour - 3 Venues with Tastings and 2 Course Gourmet Lunch 

The Main Deck is the largest space on the vessel with an eleven metre cocktail bar and stunning 360 degree views over the water. 

This is general admission includes entry on board, however seating is not reserved all food drink is own expense. 

 

Premium Package   $250pp-  Wine Tour and Upper Deck 

Half Day Wine Tour - 3 Venues with Tastings and 2 Course Gourmet Lunch 

Signature Cocktail on arrival at YOT

The VIP Upper Deck is limited to 80 guests and includes a private cocktail bar and two private bathrooms. 

Enjoy the cruise with expansive views over the Main Deck, stage and surrounding water. Also include access to the rest of the YOT.

Seating is available for all guests however not reserved all food drink is own expense. 


The above packages are suitable for 10 or more guests 

 

VIP Booth Packages 

Take your YOT Club experience to the next level and celebrate in style with a VIP Booth for 10 guests. 

Choose between a limited number of private booths on the Upper or Main Deck. 


Booth Packages - Only Available for Groups of 10 maximum 

Standard Package + Main Deck VIP Booth    $320pp

Half Day Wine Tour - 3 Venues with Tastings and 2 Course Gourmet Lunch 

Main Deck VIP Booth Inclusions:

  •  10 guests Maximum 

  • Reserved seating 

  • 1 x bottle of Moet & Chandon Imperial Brut*

  • 1 x bottle of Grey Goose Vodka 700ml*

  • 5 x Red Bull mixers*

  • Variety of other mixers*

  • Grazing platter (for up to 10 guests)

  • Designated wait staff for bottle service beverages

  • Option to order bottle service spirits or start a bar tab 

  • Please Note x10 guests must be paid for even if less guests attending 

 

Premium Package + Upper Deck VIP Booth    $370pp

  • Tickets for up to 10 guests 

  • Reserved seating in prime location 

  • Signature YOT Club cocktail on arrival for all guests

  • 2 x bottle of Moet & Chandon Imperial Brut*

  • 1 x bottle of Grey Goose Vodka 700ml*

  • 5 x Red Bull mixers*

  • Variety of other mixers*

  • Grazing platter (for up to 10 guests)

  • Designated wait staff for bottle service beverages

  • Private cocktail bar 

  • Private bathrooms

  • Access to all areas of the YOT Club

  • Option to order additional bottle service spirits or start a bar tab 

  • Please Note x10 guests must be paid for even if less guests attending 

 

 * Drinks Included above can change at any time 


ENTRY & DRESS STANDARDS

Dress Code:

The YOT Club is an upmarket venue and we encourage patrons to dress to a high standard. 

Please note men MUST wear collared shirts.

Please see the dress standards guide below. We ask that you share the dress standards guide with your invited guests, failure to adhere to our dress standards will result in entry being denied.

Tattoo Policy:

  • No face, head or knuckle tattoos

  • No tattoos that are offensive or gang related

  • Neck tattoos are required to be covered by clothing

Management reserves the right to refuse entry to any person or group at any time at its sole discretion.

 

Entry ID requirements:

Patrons must be 18 years and over to attend a YOT Club ticketed event. You must have your ID with you, photos or copies of ID will not be accepted. Acceptable forms of ID required:

  • A current Australian Drivers License

  • An Australian or foreign Passport

  • An 18+ Card

Smoking:

The YOT Club is a no smoking and no vaping venue.


Group Bookings 

Minimum of 10 Guests is required for Wine Tour and YOT   if you have less guests attending you are charged for 10 guests

products.name: Private Cape Byron Distillery Tour
products.shortDescription: Enjoy a door to door service with this tour and tasting of Cape Byron Distillery. These tours book out so we do recommend booking well in advance.
products.description:
• Guided tastings at Cape Byron Distillery – tasting fees included
  • Informative and detailed description of the Gin making process
  • Rainforest Tour
  • Pick-up and drop-off at your Gold Coast hotel or AirBnB*
  • Lively narrative on local sights, history and hidden gems
  • Photo stops at beautiful scenic outlook
  • Photos of your day
  • Luxury, air conditioned mini bus
  • Eco Friendly
  • Private, experienced driver guide
  • Tour Departs: Gold Coast, Northern NSW and Byron Bay
Rainforest/Distillery Tours

Tours kick off on the balcony of Cape Byron Distillery where you are greeted with a gin and tonic on arrival. After hearing a bit about Cape Byron Distilleries story, your guide will take you on a walk through the regenerated subtropical rainforest where you will become well acquainted with the native ingredients used in the award winning gin. After that, we will come back up to the distillery to do a full guided tasting while sitting around a 2000L copper pot still. Tour duration is around 1hr 45mins. After the tour, groups are more than welcome to hang out on the balcony and enjoy a drink or cocktail.


Tasting Flights

Tasting flights include a Gin & Tonic plus a sample of Brookie's Byron Dry Gin, Brookie's Byron Slow Gin and Mac Liqueur. you can also sample of Brookie's New Make Spirit that is slowly maturing into a beautiful whisky. Other seasonal features may also be available to add on to the flight. One of the cellar door staff will walk you through each taster provided (15 mins in duration). After the tour, groups are more than welcome to hang out on the balcony and enjoy a drink or cocktail.

products.name: Private Daytime - Scenic Rim Glow Worm Tour
products.shortDescription: Glow worms only exist in Australia and New Zealand so come on a fantastic journey with is to meet these small but brightly glowing creatures, Guaranteed sightings and time for morning tea and scenic lookouts throughout the National Park.
products.description:
Daytime Scenic Rim Glow Worm Experience includes:

- (includes, luxury transport, guided experience and time for morning tea)

- Visit the Famous Glow Worm caves on Tamborine Mountain

- Daytime Tour so no need to go out late at night

- Drive through Tamborine Mountain National Park - No walking required
- Visit an award winning winery for a guided tasting (Optional) $10
- Fudge tasting (Optional) - Free
- Time for morning tea at Restaurants, cafes and eateries

- Stop for photos at Scenic Lookouts
- Newest luxury vehicles
- Eco Friendly

Pickup 9:00 am - Drop Off 12:30 pm


Witness the effects of an innovative conservation effort. We invite you to join us on a guided glow worm tour of a specially constructed cave. We can ensure that guests will have the opportunity to see glow worms because access to the cave is restricted to guided tours in order to protect the glow worms that live here. Do not overlook our frog show! With your glow worm tour, you may visit a self-guided frog and bug display at no additional cost.


Situated in a restored rainforest as a consequence of decades of replanting work on top of Tamborine Mountain. Trained biologists will lead you on a journey along our boardwalk through the jungle and into the glow worm habitat. Here, you can get a close-up encounter with a glow worm and observe its sticky silk threads and glowing body. 


Glow worms are dependent on rainforests and wet caves for their continuous survival since they need a home that is perpetually moist. However, due to climate change and human activities, Australia's rainforest habitats are dwindling. This specially designed glow worm cave at Tamborine Mountain offers the best conditions for glow worms in a controlled habitat, mitigating the effects of human activity.



Tour Highlights

- Get picked up from your hotel and take a quick scenic drive out to the Scenic Rim and Tamborine Mountain

- Visit the Famous Glow Worm caves on Tamborine Mountain

- Learn about the History of Tamborine Mountain through the eyes of a local

- Visit a boutique Winery - $10 extra

- Time for morning tea at Restaurants, cafes and eateries

- Stop at lookouts along the way and enjoy views of the Scenic Rim

products.name: Private Gold Coast Eco Safari
products.shortDescription: Get transported through history with this guided tour of the Gold Coast's towns beaches and historical landmarks. Followed by a 1hr boat cruise around islands, canals and the Broadwater for an up close and personal pelican feeding.
products.description:
TOUR INCLUDES
– Guided Commentary
– Small Group Tour
– Local Guides
- 1.5 Hr boat cruise
- Tea and Coffee
– Point of interest and lots to see along the way
- New vehicles
- If you don't see animals you can come for free
– Eco Friendly


Your guide awaits, to take you on an unforgettable journey with a pick up from your Gold Coast hotel to experience the beauty of Australia’s natural flora and fauna with Pineapple Tours Eco Safari. On this wildlife walk you’ll encounter wild kangaroos, koalas, and other native animals.

Take a relaxed stroll through the untouched eco forest and admire the towering gum trees, paperbarks and tropical ferns. Keep your camera ready to capture the natural beauty around you. This award winning tour is a must do for anyone looking for a relaxing and breathtaking experience.

After your eco Safari  you will travel to the Marina Mirage in time to board our boat.

Imagine gliding silently out on to silken waterways under electric power and hearing nothing but water lapping against the bow of the boat. Like the river boats of Europe and Venice, the Duffy’s are built to be able to glide silently beneath the lowest bridges on the Gold Coast. This allows us to navigate where no other cruise company can, making a Duffy cruise a truly memorable experience.

On our cruise you may experience both marine and wildlife such as Dolphins, Turtles, Stingrays, Sea Eagles, Ibis, Peacocks and more as we cruise through Main Beach, Southport, Paradise Waters, , Surfers Paradise. You will see beautiful homes, boats, restaurants and helicopters as we glide silently through secluded canals abounding in the Gold Coast’s most tropical and unique flora and fauna.

This award winning tour is a must do for anyone looking for a relaxing and breathtaking experience.



Meeting Points for Pickup*
Door to door all centrally located hotels


Please call us on 0466331232 or email us at bookings@pineappletours.com.au to confirm availability before booking.

Production is on full show to visitors from the Tasting Room.

products.name: Private Husk Distillery Tour
products.shortDescription:
We Offer groups 3 Tour Options 
Standard -  Transfer to and from Husk with a knowledgeable Guide
Tasting Package  - Visit Husk Distillery with Gin and Rum Tasting
Premium with Tour of Facility -Tasting paddle and lunch
products.description:
Standard Tour - Includes transfers to and from Husk Distillery   ( All food / drinks - own expense) 

Lunch Package  - Transfer to and from Husk  &  2 Course Lunch

Premium -  Tour of Facility -Tasting paddle &  2 Course Lunch
Informative and detailed description of the Gin and Rum -making process. 

Distillery tours last for around 45 minutes and include a gin and tonic on arrival, an exclusive behind-the-scenes tour of the distillery before finishing with a  tasting flight in the barrel house.


  • Newest Air Conditioned Vehicles
  • Eco Friendly
  • Private, experienced driver guide
  • Tour departs from: Brisbane, Gold Coast, Northern NSW and Byron Bay

 

Come with us over the border through the stunning foothills and pastures of Northern New South Wales and see stunning views of Mount Warning along the way with our door to door service to Husk Distillers.

After years of planning, building, flooding and building again, Husk Farm Distillery is now open. Come for a walk-through tour of the production facility and soak in the beautiful rural location while sipping an original Husk Rum or Ink Gin cocktail in the cellar door, before taking home a bottle of your own for later.

Follow the journey from paddock to bottle, and learn how they make their single estate agricole rum and Ink Gin.

Lunch is served from the on-site restaurant. Relax in the sun with a drink in hand as you take in the picturesque surroundings. 

Book a tour during the week and you might see the production team in action - fermenting, distilling and crushing sugar cane during the harvest season (August-October), and bottling Ink Gin all year round.


Please Note for groups over 11 Guests - Standard Package is unavailable -     Only  Lunch Package or Premium Package for groups over 11 guests

products.name: Private Rum, Gin and Liquor Distillery and Brewery Tour
products.shortDescription: Visit award winning distilleries and a brewery in Mount Tamborine and the Gold Coast and taste some of Queensland's best craft beers. Tastings and Tour fees included.
products.description:
Please call us on 0466331232 or email us at bookings@pineappletours.com.au to confirm availability before booking.


We do have multiple buses so sometimes we can run an extra bus when it says we are fully booked.

BREWERY AND DISTILLERY TOUR INCLUDES
– Guided Tastings at each venue
– A Gourmet Pizza lunch
- A guided tour of a working distillery
– Cheese Factory visit
– Scenic lookouts along the way
- Eco Friendly
– Door to door service*

- Newest Luxury vehicles
*If your pick up location is not within 10kms of the city centre, you MUST enquire before booking online.


DETAILS 
Pineapple Tours will pick you up from your home or holiday
accommodation at approximately 9 am*. From there, you will be driven
through the winding valleys of the Gold Coast to Tamborine Mountain in
an air conditioned Minibus, At every turn you will encounter
breathtaking scenery, abundant wildlife and crisp mountain air, but that
is not all that Tamborine has to offer.
You will visit 2 boutique award winning distilleries followed by an
award winning brewery. Each venue has something unique to offer and will
host a guided private tasting for our group, this will allow you to try
the different varieties at each venue.
This tour includes a delicious lunch at one of Tamborine
Mountains top breweries and is included in your tour, as well as all of
your tasting fees. Snacks and water will also be available on the bus
and is all inclusive.
For the lovers of Cheese, simply let us know on the day and we will stop at Witches Chase Factory
Pineapple Tours entertaining and knowledgeable guide will ensure you
have an extremely fun and unforgettable experience while teaching you a
thing or two along the way!
 
Relax and reminisce about your wonderful day on the drive home as at
around 4:30pm* you will be dropped back at your pickup point.


Please call us on 0466331232 or email us at bookings@pineappletours.com.au to confirm availability before booking.
We do have multiple buses so sometimes we can run an extra bus when it says we are fully booked.

OUR ITINERARY*
– Tamborine Mountain Distillery
– Beenleigh Rum Distillery
– Fortitude Brewery
– Cheese Factory and scenic lookouts (optional)
