products.name: Rage Cage + Beer
products.shortDescription:
Looking for something different to do for your Bucks Party , Birthday or Special occasion? 
Tour includes  Unlimited Rage Cage followed by a selection of the Gold Coasts best craft Breweries
products.description:
Rage Cage and Beer tour includes


• Private Tour for just your group
• New Luxury Vehicles
• Unlimited Rage Cage
• Visit Craft Breweries
• Relaxed and Fun Guides
• Lunch included

• Beer Tasting at each venue


For Larger Groups it is best to call and confirm availability before booking online

Tours do book out well in advance we do recommend booking at least 3 months in advance for busy dates


What the hell is a smash room?? I hear you ask...this is the perfect opportunity to find out….come along see what we do, book a smashtime, or just buy a voucher for another time…we guarantee it’ll be an eye opener...

 

RAGE CAGE

Rage Cage is a fun, controlled and safe way to be destructive.  It’s you in a cage with breakables (dinnerware, glassware, ceramics) and a selection of weapons for you to start smashing. There’s something oddly satisfying, fun and downright addictive when you smash something as you’ll discover by time in one of our specially designed break rooms.

Each session gets you unlimited time in the break room.  You’ll get 30 a crate of breakables.  The breakables vary from plates, bowl, cups, jars & bottles.

On top of your general smash session you can purchase additional smash items such as TVs, printers/microwaves , guitars , we currently have a full size organ for , pinatas , and best selling item the colour smash!

You will have a weapons wall.  Weapon selection varies based on what’s not broken on the day.  We have wooden and metal baseball bats, golf clubs, hockey sticks, sledgehammers, cricket bats and even some breakables can be used as weapons. 

A safety/rules brief.  This is important to ensure the safety of our breakers.  Please listen and follow all guidelines.

Safety gear.  You’ll be provided with gumboots (please bring your own mid length socks), coveralls, hair net, full faced safety mask, and cut proof gloves.

After this we will quench your hard earned thirsts with a good cold beer and the best cold beer is for you to decide while visiting three of the best craft breweries that Brisbane has to offer.


All tours with Pineapple Tours are designed to be fun, relaxed days out and our guides are trained to be part of the group to help you make the most of your experience.



Requirements for Rage Cage bookings:

  • You must be over 18
  • All participants must wear enclosed shoes
  • Not intoxicated prior to Rage Cage
  • Not more than 20 weeks pregnant

BREWERY TOUR


If you love craft beer and breathtaking views, then come join us for a brewery tour in Brisbane or the Gold Coast! Our knowledgeable guides will lead you through some of the region's best breweries, sampling the finest beers. You'll also get to experience some of the area's most stunning scenery as you explore. Book now and join us for an unforgettable experience!

products.shortDescription:
Self Guided Tour Exploring Mt Tamborine,  Have fun solving riddles & puzzles that will lead you to your next location. 
Visiting along the way a variety of fabulous venues, includes lunch and some hidden gems of Mt Tamborine
products.description:
• Travel At your own pace
  • Find hidden spots that you wouldn't find on your own
  • Lunch Included

Experience Mt Tamborine’s stunning beauty. Tamborine offers some of the granite belt’s best wineries., natural rainforest's and spectacular views as well as boutique stores and various gourmet food producers. 

Enjoy the day at your own pace, and have fun along the way solving puzzles & riddles to find your next stop on the mountain.

A day to remember and share with someone special , as you will visit the absolute best venues that Mt Tamborine has to offer, tantalise your tastebuds and be speechless at the beauty of the region.

Cafe Lunch is included , as you enjoy the scavenger hunt it will lead you to the perfect spot to have your lunch.

This is the perfect tour for Couples wanting to enjoy time together exploring Or for those wanting to do something a bit different for a special occasion.

products.shortDescription: Go “behind the scenes” of a state-of-the-art winery facility at picturesque Mount Cotton vineyards, discover how the wines are made, the history of Queensland’s Granite Belt wine region and the tale of the family behind it all.
products.description:
Winery Tour & Premium Tasting
Enjoy a “behind the scenes” tour of our state-of-the-art winery facility,
followed by a private tutored wine tasting of a selection of Sirromet’s
most highly awarded wines, rarely available for tasting. Learn the
history of Queensland’s Granite Belt and how our wines are crafted
as a true expression of the region. These prestigious award-winning
premium wines include our wild yeast fermented Le Sauvage range
and Private Collection LM Assemblage, a benchmark of outstanding
quality and style.

Ideally located at Mount Cotton, just 30 minutes from the iconic
Gold Coast and Brisbane International airport, the picturesque
family owned winery is set over 560 acres and is surrounded by
natural bushland and lakes with a myriad of native wildlife, flora
and fauna, coupled with breathtaking views over Moreton Bay.

- Availability 7 days a week

products.shortDescription: Nestled amongst the native paperbark and giant scribbly gum trees, your luxurious tented glamping pavilion offers elegant, comfort and style, allowing you to escape the everything the winery has to offer.
products.description:
Enjoy a 2 night escape in the Laguna suite at Sanctuary by Sirromet. 

Nestled amongst the native paperbark and giant scribbly gum trees,
your luxurious tented glamping pavilion offers elegant, comfort and
style, allowing you to escape the everyday, re-connect with nature and
experience everything the winery has to offer. 

During your stay at Sirromet you will enjoy our Ultimate Winery
Experience of a “behind the scenes” tour of our state-of-the-art winery
facilities followed by a private tutored wine tasting. 

Also included in this
spectacular experience is our Best of Queensland indulgence, where
you will enjoy a delicious 5-course Tuscan inspired degustation with
matching wines at Sirromet’s Tuscan Terrace. 

You will also personally
meet one of our chef’s and learn of our food & wine philosophy. 

Go wallaby spotting and take in the beautiful surrounds during your stay
with a delicious picnic hamper for two, with everything you need to just
sit, relax and take in the atmosphere. 

As a memento of your stay take
home 2 bottles of Sirromet’s Le Sauvage range.


Ideally located at Mount Cotton, just 30 minutes from the iconic
Gold Coast and Brisbane International airport, the picturesque
family owned winery is set over 560 acres and is surrounded by
natural bushland and lakes with a myriad of native wildlife, flora
and fauna, coupled with breathtaking views over Moreton Bay.

products.name: Southern Gold Coast - Northern NSW - Hop on Hop Off Bus
products.shortDescription: Explore Southern Gold Coast and Northern NSW with our Hop on Hop off Bus! Visit Currumbin Wildlife Sanctuary, Burleigh Heads National Park, Husk Distillery, Tropical Fruit World, and more, Unlimited Hop on Hop off pass to all attractions.
products.description:
Create Your Own Adventure: Southern Gold Coast & Northern NSW Hop on Hop off Bus


Experience the ultimate freedom to explore the Southern Gold Coast and Northern New South Wales at your own pace with our Hop on Hop off Bus service. Operating every Monday and Friday, this flexible transportation option allows you unlimited access to a variety of attractions, from pristine beaches and national parks to cultural centres and gourmet destinations.


How It Works

• Unlimited Access: Enjoy unlimited hopping on and off between all listed attractions throughout the day.

• Convenient Pickups: Departures from various Gold Coast locations make it easy to start your adventure.

• Flexible Scheduling: Spend as much or as little time as you like at each stop. Simply catch the next bus when you’re ready to move on.


Featured Attractions


Currumbin Wildlife Sanctuary

Discover Australian Wildlife

Get up close with Australia’s unique animals at Currumbin Wildlife Sanctuary. Hand-feed kangaroos, cuddle a koala, and watch exciting wildlife shows. The sanctuary also features a high ropes adventure course for thrill-seekers.

• Highlights: Wildlife encounters, bird shows, TreeTop Challenge

• Ideal For: Families, animal lovers, adventure enthusiasts


Jellurgal Aboriginal Cultural Centre

Immerse in Indigenous Culture

Learn about the rich Aboriginal history of the Gold Coast at Jellurgal. Guided tours offer insights into Dreamtime stories, bush tucker, and the significance of the land.

• Highlights: Guided cultural walks, art gallery, storytelling

• Ideal For: Cultural enthusiasts, history buffs, educational groups


Burleigh Heads National Park

Nature’s Coastal Gem

Explore walking trails that weave through rainforest and offer stunning ocean views. Perfect for a leisurely hike or a picnic by the sea.

• Highlights: Coastal walks, wildlife spotting, panoramic viewpoints

• Ideal For: Nature lovers, hikers, photographers


Tropical Fruit World

A Feast for the Senses

Discover exotic fruits from around the world. Enjoy guided tours, fruit tastings, and family-friendly activities like mini-golf and farm animal encounters.

• Highlights: Fruit plantation tours, tastings, orchard discovery walks

• Ideal For: Foodies, families, horticulture enthusiasts


Catch a Crab

An Unforgettable River Adventure

Experience the Tweed River like never before. Participate in crab catching, oyster farming, and pelican feeding aboard a fun-filled cruise.

• Highlights: Crab catching, fishing, river cruise

• Ideal For: Adventure seekers, families, seafood lovers


The Spa at Salt

Relax and Rejuvenate

Indulge in luxurious spa treatments that will leave you refreshed. Choose from massages, facials, and wellness packages.

• Highlights: Spa treatments, wellness programs, relaxation lounges

• Ideal For: Couples, solo travellers needing relaxation, spa enthusiasts


Husk Distillery

Sip and Savour Local Spirits

Visit the home of Ink Gin and Husk Rum. Enjoy distillery tours, tastings, and a relaxing time in the cellar door and café overlooking the countryside.

• Highlights: Distillery tours, spirit tastings, scenic views

• Ideal For: Adults, spirit connoisseurs, those interested in craft distilling


Northern Rivers Rail Trail

Explore the Hinterland

Walk or cycle along the historic rail corridor, taking in the natural beauty and charm of the Northern Rivers region.

• Highlights: Scenic trails, heritage sites, outdoor exercise

• Ideal For: Cyclists, walkers, history enthusiasts


Murwillumbah

Artistic Heart of the Region

Discover local art at the Tweed Regional Gallery and Margaret Olley Art Centre. Stroll through the town’s vibrant streets filled with cafés, boutiques, and galleries.

• Highlights: Art galleries, shopping, dining

• Ideal For: Art lovers, shoppers, cultural explorers


Why Choose Our Hop on Hop off Bus?

• Customise Your Day: Tailor your itinerary to suit your interests.

• Comfort and Convenience: Travel in comfort without worrying about parking or navigation.

• Local Knowledge: Our friendly drivers can provide tips and information about each destination.


Booking Information

• Operating Days: Every Monday and Friday

• Pick-Up Locations: Multiple points across the Gold Coast

• Tickets: Available for purchase online or at select outlets


Embark on a journey where you hold the map. Whether you’re seeking adventure, relaxation, or cultural enrichment, the Southern Gold Coast and Northern NSW Hop on Hop off Bus offers a gateway to unforgettable experiences. Book your seat today and start creating your own adventure!


*This ticket is for bus transfers only and doesn’t include a Booking at any venues or attractions

products.name: Tamborine Rainforest Skywalk + Hop on Hop Off Day Pass from Brisbane
products.shortDescription: Journey on the Hop on Hop off Bus from Brisbane to Tamborine Rainforest Skywalk, followed by an afternoon Hop on Hop off tour to explore Tamborine Mountain’s top attractions at your own pace.
products.description:
Tamborine Rainforest Skywalk + Hop On Hop Off Shuttle




Pickup Times




• 8:30am: Pickup from Hotels in Brisbane






Tamborine Mountain Rainforest Skywalk


Arrive at 10:00am 




The Walk:


The entire walk spans 1.5 km and offers a unique blend of forest floor trails and high-tech steel bridges. The journey includes 300 metres of elevated bridges weaving through the upper canopy of the rainforest. One of the highlights is the 40-metre cantilever bridge, towering 30 metres above the creek and forest floor, offering breathtaking views of the lush rainforest.




Hop On Hop Off – Tamborine Mountain


Explore Tamborine Mountain at your own pace with the Hop On Hop Off Day Pass, giving you the freedom to discover the mountain’s natural beauty, culture, and unique attractions. Whether you’re visiting for the lush landscapes, quaint shops, or artisanal food and drink, this service allows you to tailor your itinerary to suit your interests.



Throughout the day, the shuttle bus will loop around Tamborine Mountain every hour, giving you ample opportunity to visit key stops such as:




• Rainforest Skywalk


• Gallery Walk (featuring boutique shops and cafes)


• Distilleries & Wineries


• Tamborine National Park


• Botanic Gardens


• Local Markets




If you’re unsure where to go, the friendly driver can assist in crafting the perfect plan based on your preferences, helping you make the most of your day.




Key Features of the Hop On Hop Off Experience:


• Unlimited travel for the day on the shuttle across Tamborine Mountain.


• Stops at all major attractions, so you won’t miss anything.


• Flexible scheduling so you can hop off at any stop to explore and hop back on to continue your journey.


• Relaxing, stress-free travel as the shuttle takes you to each destination with expert local knowledge from the driver.




Return to Brisbane


• Depart Tamborine Mountain at 3:30pm


• Arrive in Brisbane by 5:00pm




Your Hop On Hop Off ticket also includes transfers from Brisbane , giving you a seamless journey from city to mountain and back.




Important Information:




• This ticket includes entry to the Tamborine Rainforest Skywalk and unlimited access to the Hop On Hop Off shuttle for the day.


• Entry to other attractions is not included but can be purchased at each venue on the day.


• Make sure to review your itinerary and inform the driver of your preferred stops so they can assist with timing and suggestions.




Enjoy a day filled with nature, culture, and adventure, making memories as you explore Tamborine Mountain’s hidden gems!

products.name: The Hinterland Explorer - 1 DAY PASS
products.shortDescription: Embark on a journey of discovery with the Hinterland Explorer Pass! Whether you're a nature enthusiast, a cultural explorer, or simply seeking a refreshing escape, our pass offers you the flexibility to curate your own adventure.
products.description:
Hinterland Explorer


This pass allows unlimited travel on the Hinterland Explorer - Multi Day Passes also available

  • 1 Day Pass
  • Infant Free - If travelling on lap
  • Self Guided walks
  • Stops at all key attractions in each region
  • Different Regions each day


Embark on a journey of discovery with the Hinterland Explorer Pass! Whether you're a nature enthusiast, a cultural explorer, or simply seeking a refreshing escape, our pass offers you the flexibility to curate your own adventure. Guests can choose between day passes or multi-day passes and explore a different captivating region each day from our carefully curated list, including Tamborine Mountain, Springbrook, Binna Burra, Byron Bay, Brisbane, and Lamington National Park. Immerse yourself in the natural wonders, cultural gems, and outdoor adventures that each region has to offer, creating unforgettable memories with every exploration. With the Hinterland Explorer Pass, your Australian hinterland adventure awaits!


Pickup Locations and Timetable

  • Gold Coast
  • 6:30am pickup from Surfers Paradise Transit Centre


Regions that you can visit with the Hinterland Explorer Day Pass


  1. Tamborine Mountain (Wednesday and Saturday):

    • Explore the lush Tamborine Mountain, a haven for nature lovers.
    • Attractions: Tamborine Rainforest Skywalk, Gallery Walk, Curtis Falls, Glow Worm Caves, Tamborine Botanic Gardens.

  2. Springbrook (Monday and Thursday):

    • Discover the enchanting beauty of Springbrook, known for its pristine rainforests and waterfalls.
    • Short Walks: (Recommended) Twin Falls, Bilbrough Falls, Best of All Lookout.
    • Attractions: Natural Bridge, Purling Brook Falls, Best of All Lookout, Springbrook Plateau, Canyon Lookout.

  3. Binna Burra (Monday and Thursday):

    • Binna Burra offers a tranquil escape amidst World Heritage-listed rainforests.
    • Attractions: Ships Stern Circuit, Tullawallal Circuit, Bellbird Lookout, Lamington Teahouse, Coomera Circuit.

  4. Byron Bay (Friday):

    • Experience the laid-back vibe of Byron Bay, a coastal gem famous for its beaches and artsy culture.
    • Attractions: Byron Bay Beaches, Cape Byron Lighthouse and enjoy a trip through the hinterland on the way.

  5. Brisbane (Tuesday):

    • Explore the vibrant city of Brisbane, where modernity meets culture and nature.
    • Attractions: South Bank Parklands, Queensland Art Gallery, Lone Pine Koala Sanctuary, Story Bridge Climb, Brisbane River Cruise.

  6. Lamington National Park (Sunday):

    • Lamington National Park is a UNESCO-listed paradise for hikers and wildlife enthusiasts.
    • Attractions: O'Reilly's Rainforest Retreat, Tree Top Walk, Toolona Creek Circuit, Box Forest Circuit, Albert River Circuit.

These regions offer a diverse range of natural beauty, cultural experiences, and outdoor adventures, making your Hinterland Explorer Pass a gateway to unforgettable moments in Australia's stunning hinterlands.

Please note that while you will be given history and insights along the way the driver will remain with the bus and all walks are self guided.


Extras:

Go Explore Cards

Start exploring for $10 a day


This pass can be added to your Day Pass then topped up as needed, you can use this to travel on all public transport around the Gold Coast and Sunshine Coast.

 

Explore breathtaking beaches, wildlife, theme parks and award winning dining on the Gold Coast and now, the Sunshine Coast.

The go explore card offers visitors and tourists freedom, flexibility and value for money!

  • only $10 a day for unlimited travel
  • no need to carry cash on your journeys
  • reload up to eight day passes on your card
  • travel on non-consecutive days.

products.name: The Hop on Hop Off Bus - Tamborine Mountain - From Brisbane
products.shortDescription: Embark on an adventure from Brisbane to the enchanting heights of Tamborine Mountain with our exclusive hop-on, hop-off bus service. Departing every morning from Brisbane. Enjoy the flexibility to explore Tamborine Mountain.
products.description:
Tamborine Mountain Hop on Hop Off Bus


TAMBORINE MOUNTAIN MAP


Pickup Locations and Timetable

Brisbane
8:30am Pickup from City
4:00pm Departure for 5pm return


Embark on a daily adventure from the heart of Brisbane to the enchanting heights of Tamborine Mountain with our exclusive hop-on, hop-off bus service. With no public bus routes to this picturesque locale, our service offers a unique opportunity to explore the lush landscapes and breathtaking views of Tamborine Mountain at your own pace. Departing every morning from Brisbane, our comfortable buses provide a direct link to the natural beauty and serene environment of one of Queensland's most treasured destinations. Enjoy the flexibility to explore the mountain's famous wineries, artisanal shops, and stunning walking trails before hopping back on the bus to return to the city. This service is your gateway to experiencing the tranquility of Tamborine Mountain, making it an unmissable adventure for both locals and visitors alike.


Nature Based Tourism, Lookouts, local attractions

  1. Tamborine Mountain Skywalk
  2. Tamborine Mountain Coffee Plantation
  3. Tamborine Mountain Botanic Gardens
  4. Gallery Walk Shopping Precinct
  5. St Bernards Hotel - Booking Recommended
  6. Jasmine Organics
  7. Robert Sowter Park - (Lookout)
  8. Rotary Lookout
  9. Visitor Information Centre
  10. Tamborine Mountain Cheese
  11. Curtis Falls Walking track
  12. Cedar Creek Falls
  13. Witches Falls Walking Trail
  14. Tamborine National Park
  15. Witches Falls Circuit
  16. Thunderbird Park
  17. Palm Grove Section


Wineries, Breweries, Distilleries

  1. Cedar Creek Estate Vineyard & Winery
  2. Hampton Estate Wines - Booking with Venue Required
  3. Castle Glen Australia
  4. Cauldron Distillery
  5. Fortitude Brewing Company
  6. Witches Falls Winery
  7. Tamborine Mountain Distillery
  8. Tamborine Mountain Coffee Plantation

Each of these attractions offers a unique experience, from tasting locally produced wines and spirits to exploring the natural beauty and artistic culture of Tamborine Mountain.

Return to Gold Coast and Brisbane

Depart Mountain 4:00pm

Arrive Brisbane 5:00pm


Gold Coast and Brisbane Shuttles will join this service and you will have an unlimited hop on hop off pass for the day.


Please look at your itinerary and plan which venues you would like to see and let the driver know so they can mark it off on our pickup list for the day.


*This ticket is for hop on hop off shuttle transfers only and doesn’t include entry to an attractions

products.name: The Ultimate Gourmet Tasting Experience
products.shortDescription:
Join us on an exclusive Gourmet Food Tour to remember
This is a personalised experience of local gourmet food producers in the region, we will pair tastings with gourmet food and an unforgettable experience along the way.
products.description:
The Ultimate Gourmet Tasting Experience


Indulge in the perfect day out with The Ultimate Gourmet Tasting Experience by Pineapple Tours, a personalised, all-inclusive journey through South East Queensland’s best culinary and scenic destinations. Whether you’re a discerning traveller or a local seeking a luxurious escape, this tour is tailored to meet your needs and exceed your expectations.


Tour Highlights:

• All-Inclusive Bespoke Experience: Designed specifically for your group, with attention to every detail.

• Guided Tastings: Visit local providores to sample the finest produce in the region.

• Unique Experiences: Gain access to exclusive activities that you won’t find anywhere else.

• Gourmet Lunch: Relish a carefully curated lunch at one of the region’s top restaurants.

• Scenic Lookouts: Stop at breathtaking viewpoints along the way.

• Personalised Itinerary: Fully tailored to your preferences, with flexibility throughout the day.

• Dietary Requirements: All dietary needs are catered for to ensure everyone enjoys the experience.


Tour Details:

• Departure Locations: Brisbane, Gold Coast, Scenic Rim, Tamborine Mountain, and surrounding areas.

• Transport Options: Luxury SUV for small groups and a spacious air-conditioned bus for larger groups.

• Customised Itinerary: Our team will work with you to finalise your preferred stops and activities.


Sample Itinerary (customisable to suit your group):

• Morning Sightseeing: Begin your day with a scenic drive, taking in the lush countryside and picturesque towns. Opt for backroad detours to discover hidden gems, enjoy a coffee stop in charming small towns, or soak in the views from a lookout.

• Gourmet Tastings: Visit the finest local providores and sample their exquisite produce. From artisan cheeses to boutique chocolates, experience the best of the region’s culinary offerings.

• Gourmet Lunch: Delight in a leisurely lunch at one of the area’s top restaurants, featuring menus crafted from the freshest local ingredients. Choose from pre-selected options or let us surprise you with a culinary masterpiece.

• Afternoon Adventures: Continue your journey with visits to more providores, or explore local breweries and distilleries for tastings of craft beers, spirits, or liqueurs. Prefer something outdoors? Spot kangaroos in their natural habitat or, during whale season, keep an eye out for majestic whales along the coast.

• Evening Scenic Drive: Wind down with a scenic return journey, stopping at lookouts or enjoying short walks in nature. Upon your return, we’ll be happy to recommend the perfect dinner spots to end your day.


Why Choose Pineapple Tours?


At Pineapple Tours, we go beyond offering an exceptional tour—we strive to make you feel like you’re exploring the region with a family member or close friend. Every tour is completely personalised and led by our expert team, ensuring an intimate and memorable experience.


Booking Details:


Contact us today to confirm availability and start planning your perfect day out.

• Phone: 0466 331 232

• Email: bookings@pineappletours.com.au


Let us create the ultimate gourmet adventure across South East Queensland, blending indulgence, nature, and unique experiences into one unforgettable day.

products.name: The Ultimate Gourmet Tasting Experience - Brisbane
products.shortDescription:
Join us on an exclusive Gourmet Food Tour to remember
This is a personalised experience of local gourmet food producers in the region, we will pair tastings with gourmet food and an unforgettable experience along the way.
products.description:
The Ultimate Gourmet Tasting Experience  Includes


- All Inclusive Bespoke Experience designed just for your group
– Guided Tastings at Local Providores in the region

- A Guided Tour of a Distillery, brewery or winery - your choice (we can replace this with another activity for non drinkers)

- Gourmet tastings as we travel through the region

- Food Pairings

– Gourmet Lunch

– Scenic Lookouts along the way

- This tour is personalised to suit your group

- All dietary requirements are catered for.


Venues we visit*

We will choose a selection of the best venues around the area that we are visiting and this tour is personalised to suit your group.



- Departs: Brisbane, Gold Coast, Scenic Rim, Tamborine Mountain and surrounds 

- SUV is for small groups and Luxury Bus for larger Groups

Please call us on 0466331232 or email us at bookings@pineappletours.com.au to confirm availability before booking.

Private Hire Only 


Stretching inland from through the Tropical Rainforest of Southeast QLD, the Hinterland is filled with gorgeous villages, stunning scenery and a tranquillity that washes urban stresses from every visitor. Taste Local Produce along the way.


We've designed the perfect day just for you, this tour is not only for the discerning traveller but also for locals that just need a short break and with us one day is all you need to truly wind down and relax.
Our goal is not just to provide an excellent tour experience but we want you to feel that you are being shown around by a family member or a friend of the family.
Each and every experience will be completely personalised to suit your needs and can be adjusted as needed throughout the day and all of our vehicles are new and air conditioned.

The Hinterland is a short scenic drive from the Gold Coast and it has beautiful scenery of rolling green hills and valleys carved from a dormant volcano.

To start we can do a bit of sightseeing on the way, getting there is a quick trip down the valley and get straight to the Gourmet Food that we have prepared, we can also detour and take the backroads everywhere and stop in the small towns for some street side shopping and coffee along the way.

After this  stop for some cheese tasting and wine, this is right next to Witches Falls National Park with beauty that you see here a like no other place in the world. 

What is the perfect day out without the perfect lunch? We have gone to great efforts to find you the best food experiences that money can buy we can give you a few options to choose from on the day or let us surprise you with the best of the best culinary delights.

After lunch we can head to another local providores for some more tastings or even stop for another wine tasting.

Now it's the afternoon and if you would like we can sample a selection of locally owned/made beers otherwise if you prefer something stronger there are also several Distilleries in the hinterland to choose from

On the way home if you would like to take a scenic route and visit some lookouts or short walks we will be more than happy to oblige. Feel free to ask us about our dinner recommendations once we get back to the Gold Coast because what would the perfect day out be without the perfect dinner?


This tour is personalised by our team and they will reach out to you once you've booked to confirm your preferred itinerary on the day.

products.name: The Ultimate Gourmet Tasting Experience - Byron Bay
products.shortDescription: Stretching inland from Australia's most easterly point, Byron Bay's hinterland is filled with gorgeous villages, stunning scenery and a tranquillity that washes urban stresses from every visitor. Taste some of the best produce in the area
products.description:
Please call us on 0466331232 or email us at bookings@pineappletours.com.au to confirm availability before booking.


TOUR INCLUDES

- All Inclusive Bespoke Experience designed just for your group

- Private Tour Guide
– Guided Tastings at Local Providores in the region
– A Luxury Gourmet lunch - Complimentary beverages
– Gourmet Cheese platters

- A Guided Tour of a local distillery or brewery - your choice or other attractions available for non drinkers and families

- Tour through the Villages and arts and culture of the Byron Hinterland

- Sightseeing - Byron Bay Township, Cape Byron Lighthouse, Byron Hinterland

- Short Scenic Walks - Optional

– Scenic Lookouts along the way
– Photos of your day
- Eco Friendly
– Door to door Service with pickup and drop off from your home/hotel or airbnb

- Our team will reach out and personalise this tour to suit your group

- Brand New Luxury Vehicles ( Luxury SUV for 1-4 people - Luxury Bus for larger groups )

Please call us on 0466331232 or email us at bookings@pineappletours.com.au to confirm availability before booking.


Stretching inland from Australia's most easterly point, Byron Bay's hinterland is filled with gorgeous villages, stunning scenery and a tranquillity that washes urban stresses from every visitor. The rolling hills are home to countless examples of breathtaking nature and villages worth falling in love with.



We've designed the perfect day just for you, this tour is not only for the discerning traveller but also for locals that just need a short break and with us one day is all you need to truly wind down and relax.
Our goal is not just to provide an excellent tour experience but we want you to feel that you are being shown around by a family member or a friend of the family.
Each and every experience will be completely personalised to suit your needs and can be adjusted as needed throughout the day and all of our vehicles are new and air conditioned.

Byron Bay is a 1-1.5Hr drive from the Gold Coast depending on which hotel you are staying and it has beautiful scenery of rolling green hills and valleys carved from a dormant volcano.

To start we can do a bit of sightseeing on the way to Byron Bay, choose from a quick trip down the highway and get straight into the bustling town of Byron Bay or we can take the backroads everywhere and stop in the small towns of Murwillumbah, Mullumbimby and Bungalow for some street side shopping and coffee along the way.

After this go for a cruise over to Wategos Beach and Cape Byron Lighthouse, this is the most easterly point of Australia and the shades of blue that you see here a like no other place in the world. There are regularly dolphins, Seals and also Whales can be seen from the cliffs in Whale Season*. Here there is also a short 15 min Scenic walk from Cape Byron Lighthouse to Wategos Beach and you are welcome to walk down and we can pick you up at the bottom.

What is the perfect day out without the perfect lunch? We have gone to great efforts to find you the best food experiences that money can buy we can give you a few options to choose from on the day or let us surprise you with the best of the best culinary delights.

After lunch, if you prefer the beach we will head down to one of the many secluded beaches that span the shores of the candescent blue coastline, otherwise if you prefer we can head to one of the most fantastic day spas where you can experience hot and cold plunge pools, steam rooms, Saunas and you also have time for a massage*

Now it's the afternoon and if you would like we can sample a selection of locally owned/made beers at either Stone and Wood Brewery or Byron Bay Brewing Co otherwise if you prefer something stronger there are also several Distilleries in Byron Bay that we can visit including Cape Byron Distillery and Husk Distillers - Famous for their Ink Gin and agricole Rum.

On the way home if you would like to take a scenic route and visit some more special beaches on the way home we will be more than happy to oblige. Feel free to ask us about our dinner recommendations once we get back to the Gold Coast because what would the perfect day out be without the perfect dinner?


*Whale Watching Season will be from late May to early November and will bring over 20,000 Humpback Whales past the spectacular coastline of Byron Bay and right beside the Gold Coast beaches. The Whales migrate north from Antarctica into the warm waters of North Queensland in the early months and return with calves in the later months.


This tour is personalised by our team and they will reach out to you once you've booked to confirm your preferred itinerary on the day.

products.name: Tree Top Challenge and Winery Tour
products.shortDescription:
Looking for something different to do for your Bucks Party , Birthday or Special occasion? 
Tour includes  Tree top Challenge or Canyon Flyer followed by a winery tour.
products.description:
Tree Top Challenge and Winery Tour includes


• Private Tour for just your group
• New luxury vehicles
• Plenty of time to complete your challenge
• Guided tastings at each winery

• Lunch 

• Relaxed and Fun Guides
• Door to Door Service



The price includes access to all challenges, zip-lines and circuits in the park plus all safety equipment and training. 


Option 1. TreeTop Challenge


  • Over 140 challenging elements to tackle
  • 14 epic ziplines, including a 120m long epic
  • 4 levels to tackle, from easy through to extreme 
  • 12 acres of world heritage nature to explore
  • 8 Tree Top Courses, we are massive!


The TreeTop Challenge at Tamborine Mountain is Australia’s largest High Ropes Adventure Park with more than 120 TreeTop Activities including 10 flying foxes! Our courses range from easy to extreme and traverse through 9 acres of amazing bushland and rainforest. To complete the entire Adventure Park will take 3 to 4 hours where you will have an amazing adventure flying through the trees, conquering your fears and having a whole lot of fun! Our Adventure Park is designed for the entire family aged 8 and up, you don’t need any experience and it’s perfect for all fitness levels! Your unforgettable adventure awaits!


Option 2. Currumbin Highlights

  • Zipline over crocodiles, kangaroos, dingoes and emus
  • Over 80 challenging elements to tackle
  • 11 epic ziplines
  • 4 levels to tackle, from easy through to extreme

In dense rainforest less than 200m from Currumbin Beach you’ll be high in the sky pushing your mind and body to jump, climb and pull yourself through more than 80 challenges of varying difficulties along with 11 absolutely epic and extreme flying foxes.

At Currumbin there are five unique circuits starting off easy and working up to heart-pumping extreme. We guarantee this will be a day of thrills, adventure and unforgettable memories in nature as you tackle balancing beams, swing into nets and shuffle across single wires.

Our Currumbin Adventure Park is located within Currumbin Wildlife Sanctuary, which means you will spot iconic Australian wildlife such as kangaroos, crocodiles, dingoes and emus from the vantage point of the Tree Top Canopy as you zipline over animal enclosures during the challenge.

You get to work each circuit at your own pace – no group tours here, you’re up there on your own, with your family or group! Jump, grab, pull and leap through the Green level as you build confidence, and work your way up to the super challenging Black course.

We operate with the highest grade safety equipment, and use a state-of-the-art smart belay system. In simple terms, you can only detach from the wires once you’re on solid ground – so you’ll be safely attached to our course at all times.

Abs are not necessary, but some fitness is required to complete the course as you do need the strength to climb through the trees. Bookings are essential to guarantee a spot in the session.

If you’re ready to push yourself out of your comfort zone, tackle your fears and challenge your body join us and tackle the Currumbin Adventure Challenge.






Requirements for bookings:

  • You must be over 18
  • A minor between the ages of 14-17 with a parent or legal guardian co-signing, present and participating in the session. 
  • you must be willing to sign a waiver
  • All participants must wear enclosed shoes
  • Not intoxicated prior to axe throwing
  • Not more than 20 weeks pregnant

products.name: Visit Catch a Crab - Unlimited Hop on Hop off Day Pass - Southern Gold Coast / Northern NSW
products.shortDescription: Explore Southern Gold Coast and Northern NSW with our Hop on Hop off Bus! Visit Currumbin Wildlife Sanctuary, Burleigh Heads National Park, Jellurgal, Tropical Fruit World, and more, Unlimited Hop on Hop off pass to all attractions.
products.description:
Create Your Own Adventure: Southern Gold Coast & Northern NSW Hop on Hop off Bus


Experience the ultimate freedom to explore the Southern Gold Coast and Northern New South Wales at your own pace with our Hop on Hop off Bus service. Operating every Monday and Friday, this flexible transportation option allows you unlimited access to a variety of attractions, from pristine beaches and national parks to cultural centres and gourmet destinations.


How It Works

• Unlimited Access: Enjoy unlimited hopping on and off between all listed attractions throughout the day.

• Convenient Pickups: Departures from various Gold Coast locations make it easy to start your adventure.

• Flexible Scheduling: Spend as much or as little time as you like at each stop. Simply catch the next bus when you’re ready to move on.


Featured Attractions


Currumbin Wildlife Sanctuary

Discover Australian Wildlife

Get up close with Australia’s unique animals at Currumbin Wildlife Sanctuary. Hand-feed kangaroos, cuddle a koala, and watch exciting wildlife shows. The sanctuary also features a high ropes adventure course for thrill-seekers.

• Highlights: Wildlife encounters, bird shows, TreeTop Challenge

• Ideal For: Families, animal lovers, adventure enthusiasts


Jellurgal Aboriginal Cultural Centre

Immerse in Indigenous Culture

Learn about the rich Aboriginal history of the Gold Coast at Jellurgal. Guided tours offer insights into Dreamtime stories, bush tucker, and the significance of the land.

• Highlights: Guided cultural walks, art gallery, storytelling

• Ideal For: Cultural enthusiasts, history buffs, educational groups


Burleigh Heads National Park

Nature’s Coastal Gem

Explore walking trails that weave through rainforest and offer stunning ocean views. Perfect for a leisurely hike or a picnic by the sea.

• Highlights: Coastal walks, wildlife spotting, panoramic viewpoints

• Ideal For: Nature lovers, hikers, photographers


Tropical Fruit World

A Feast for the Senses

Discover exotic fruits from around the world. Enjoy guided tours, fruit tastings, and family-friendly activities like mini-golf and farm animal encounters.

• Highlights: Fruit plantation tours, tastings, orchard discovery walks

• Ideal For: Foodies, families, horticulture enthusiasts


Catch a Crab

An Unforgettable River Adventure

Experience the Tweed River like never before. Participate in crab catching, oyster farming, and pelican feeding aboard a fun-filled cruise.

• Highlights: Crab catching, fishing, river cruise

• Ideal For: Adventure seekers, families, seafood lovers


The Spa at Salt

Relax and Rejuvenate

Indulge in luxurious spa treatments that will leave you refreshed. Choose from massages, facials, and wellness packages.

• Highlights: Spa treatments, wellness programs, relaxation lounges

• Ideal For: Couples, solo travellers needing relaxation, spa enthusiasts


Husk Distillery

Sip and Savour Local Spirits

Visit the home of Ink Gin and Husk Rum. Enjoy distillery tours, tastings, and a relaxing time in the cellar door and café overlooking the countryside.

• Highlights: Distillery tours, spirit tastings, scenic views

• Ideal For: Adults, spirit connoisseurs, those interested in craft distilling


Northern Rivers Rail Trail

Explore the Hinterland

Walk or cycle along the historic rail corridor, taking in the natural beauty and charm of the Northern Rivers region.

• Highlights: Scenic trails, heritage sites, outdoor exercise

• Ideal For: Cyclists, walkers, history enthusiasts


Murwillumbah

Artistic Heart of the Region

Discover local art at the Tweed Regional Gallery and Margaret Olley Art Centre. Stroll through the town’s vibrant streets filled with cafés, boutiques, and galleries.

• Highlights: Art galleries, shopping, dining

• Ideal For: Art lovers, shoppers, cultural explorers


Why Choose Our Hop on Hop off Bus?

• Customise Your Day: Tailor your itinerary to suit your interests.

• Comfort and Convenience: Travel in comfort without worrying about parking or navigation.

• Local Knowledge: Our friendly drivers can provide tips and information about each destination.


Booking Information

• Operating Days: Every Monday and Friday

• Pick-Up Locations: Multiple points across the Gold Coast

• Tickets: Available for purchase online or at select outlets


Embark on a journey where you hold the map. Whether you’re seeking adventure, relaxation, or cultural enrichment, the Southern Gold Coast and Northern NSW Hop on Hop off Bus offers a gateway to unforgettable experiences. Book your seat today and start creating your own adventure!


*This ticket is for bus transfers only and doesn’t include a Booking at any venues or attractions

products.name: Zero Latency - Virtual Reality + Beer - Gold Coast
products.shortDescription:
Looking for something different to do for your Bucks Party , Birthday or Special occasion? 
Tour includes  30 Mins Game time followed by a selection of the Gold Coasts best craft Breweries with Lunch 

Minimum of 8 Guests is Required
products.description:
Zero Latency VR and Beer tour includes


• Private Tour for just your group
• New Luxury Vehicles
• 30 Minutes Zero Latency VR
• Visit 3 Craft Breweries
• Relaxed and Fun Guides
• Lunch included

• Beer Tasting Paddle at each venue (Premium Package only)  


Standard Package - Includes VR Session and Lunch - All drinks are own expense 

 

• Zero Latency can only take groups of  8 per session  we can take larger groups but you will be in multiple sessions. Our buses hold 11, 13, 23 , 38 and 54


For Larger Groups it is best to call before booking online


IMMERSE YOURSELF
FREE-ROAM VR
Virtual Reality you can't experience anywhere else.
Freedom to explore
Room to move in a space the size of a tennis court.
No cables or wires 
Move however and wherever you want.
Group entertainment 
Up to 8 friends play together.


After this we will quench your hard earned thirsts with a good cold beer and the best cold beer is for you to decide while visiting three of the best craft breweries the Gold Coast has to offer.

All tours with Pineapple Tours are designed to be fun, relaxed days out and our guides are trained to be part of the group to help you make the most of your experience.





Requirements for bookings:

  • You must be over 18
  • All participants must wear enclosed shoes
  • Not intoxicated prior to Zero Latency
  • Not more than 20 weeks pregnant

products.name: ZZZZ - USE - PKCDT3
products.shortDescription: Join our Hop on Hop off Bus to Explore the Wineries of Mount Tamborine, enjoy guided tastings at each venue and then explore the mountain at your own leisure. You can try some local food, do some shopping or visit a rainforest waterfall.
products.description:
WINE TOUR INCLUDES

- Guided Tastings at three wineries

- Local Guide

- New Model Air-conditioned minibus

- Scenic Lookouts along the way

- Flexible Schedule 
- Fresh Mountain Water
- Eco Friendly
- Door to door Service* 

6 - 8 Hrs Approx.

Gold Coast Pickup 8:30 - 9:00am

Tamborine Mountain Pickup 10:00 am - Drop Off 2:30pm (Approx)

Times can be adjusted for private bookings if needed.

Discover the authentic essence of Queensland's winemaking heritage on a short, yet profoundly genuine journey with Pineapple Tours. Escape the urban hustle of Brisbane or the lively Gold Coast for a brief but deeply immersive winery experience.

Intimate Winery Encounters:
Our curated tour takes you to select wineries where passion and tradition are woven into every bottle. Connect with winemakers and vintners, who will personally guide you through their craft, sharing stories and insights that only a local could provide.

Handcrafted Wines and Rustic Charm:
Sample limited-production wines that reflect the unique terroir of the region. These family-owned wineries offer a taste of the authentic, featuring handcrafted vintages not widely available. Savour these treasures in rustic settings that exude warmth and character.

Breathtaking Views, Genuine Hospitality:
As you journey through the countryside, relish in the stunning vistas that surround you. The farms in the region are more than just a backdrop; they're a living testament to the dedication of those who cultivate them. Experience the genuine hospitality of the growers and their families.

Memories to Cherish:
Though your visit may be brief, the memories you'll make and the wines you'll savour will linger. Take home a bottle or two of these small-batch wines, a genuine piece of Queensland's winemaking tradition to share with loved ones.

Easy and Personal:
Our tour provides easy, hassle-free transportation. You won't need to worry about logistics or navigation – simply immerse yourself in the authentic winery experience.

Join Us for a Slice of Authentic Queensland:
If you seek a genuine taste of Queensland's winemaking soul but have limited time, Pineapple Tours is your gateway. Come along for an authentic encounter with local winemakers, their craft, and the stunning landscapes that define their wines. Book your Pineapple Tours experience today and savour the authenticity of Queensland's wine culture.



* Tour Itinerary may change depending on venue trading days, weddings and functions
*If you are booking this as a private tour, you are welcome to choose the destinations and pick up/drop off times.
* Pick up and drop off times can vary depending on customer locations

productSeoTags.attrValue: Gold Coast Wine Tasting Tour & Hop-On Hop-Off Experience

Dive into the heart of the Gold Coast's wine region with our Wine Tasting Tour & Hop-On Hop-Off Experience, designed for those who wish to indulge in the art of wine tasting while exploring the lush rainforest atmosphere of Tamborine Mountain. This tour offers a seamless blend of leisurely wine exploration and the flexibility to explore at your own rhythm. Experience the Gold Coast's renowned wineries, enjoy guided tastings of award-winning wines, and gain insights into the winemaking process from the passionate vintners themselves. Our hop-on hop-off format allows you to tailor your wine journey, whether you're interested in spending more time at a favourite spot or exploring a wide array of vineyards. Ideal for both wine aficionados and those new to wine culture, this tour promises a day filled with discovery, scenic beauty, and the exquisite tastes of the Gold Coast. Reserve your spot now for an unforgettable exploration of wine in one of Australia's most picturesque regions.

productSeoTags.attrValue: Brisbane Wine Tasting Tour & Hop-On Hop-Off Experience

Explore the vibrant wine culture of Brisbane with our Wine Tasting Tour & Hop-On Hop-Off Experience. This unique journey takes you through Brisbane's exquisite vineyards and wineries, offering a taste of the region's finest wines while enjoying the atmosphere of Tamborine Mountains Subtropical Rainforest, allowing for a more flexible schedule. Perfect for wine lovers seeking adventure at their own pace, this experience combines the luxury of guided wine tastings with the freedom of a hop-on hop-off tour. Discover hidden gems and iconic estates, learn about winemaking from local experts, and savour a variety of wines that capture the essence of Brisbane's terroir. With our customizable itinerary, you have the freedom to explore in depth or sample broadly across different vineyards. Book your wine adventure today and immerse yourself in the rich flavours and scenic beauty of Brisbane's wine country.

products.name: ZZZZ use PNYY7C (BNEGLOW)
products.shortDescription: Glow worms only exist in Australia and New Zealand so come on a fantastic journey with is to meet these small but brightly glowing creatures, Guaranteed sightings and time for morning tea and scenic lookouts throughout the National Park.
products.description:
Daytime Scenic Rim Glow Worm Experience includes:

- Visit the Famous Glow Worm caves on Tamborine Mountain

- Daytime Tour so no need to go out late at night

- Drive through Tamborine Mountain National Park - No walking required
-Time for Lunch at Restaurants, cafes and eateries

- Gallery Walk - Approximately 3hrs for shopping and lunch

- Stop for photos at Scenic Lookouts
- Newest luxury vehicles
- Eco Friendly

Pickup 8:30 am - Drop Off 4:30 pm


Experience the Daytime Scenic Rim Glow Worm Adventure, a unique journey that seamlessly blends exploration, conservation, and relaxation. Embark on a guided tour to witness the mesmerizing glow worms in their natural habitat while enjoying the flexibility of a hop-on-hop-off bus tour around Tamborine Mountain.

Tour Inclusions:

  • Glow Worm Cave Exploration: Delve into the enchanting world of glow worms within a specially constructed cave. Led by knowledgeable guides, marvel at the luminescent beauty of these fascinating creatures, protected through restricted access to ensure their conservation.

  • Daytime Convenience: Experience the magic of glow worms without venturing out late at night. Our daytime tour schedule offers a convenient and accessible option for all.

  • Scenic Mountain Drive: Relax on board our luxury hop-on-hop-off bus as we traverse Tamborine Mountain National Park. Enjoy panoramic views without the need for strenuous walking.

  • Leisure Time: Take a break for lunch at your choice of restaurants, cafes, or eateries. Explore Gallery Walk, offering three hours of shopping and dining delights.

  • Scenic Lookout Stops: Capture stunning photographs at scenic viewpoints, immersing yourself in the natural beauty of the region.

  • Newest Luxury Vehicles: Travel in comfort and style aboard our eco-friendly luxury vehicles, ensuring a pleasurable journey throughout.

Tour Details:

  • Pickup: Commencing at 8:30am, we offer convenient pickups from Brisbane Marriott, Royal on the Park and Emporium Southbank.

  • Drop Off: Return to your hotel by 5:00 pm, concluding an unforgettable day of exploration and discovery - If you do need to depart before this our team can drop you at the Helensvale Train station after lunch which can get you back to Brisbane or the Gold Coast.

Conservation Focus:

  • Rainforest Restoration: Our tour takes you through a restored rainforest, the result of extensive replanting efforts atop Tamborine Mountain. Accompanied by trained biologists, traverse the boardwalks and delve into the glow worm habitat, witnessing their intricate silk threads and radiant glow up close.

  • Climate Conscious: Learn about the vital role of rainforests in the survival of glow worms and the challenges posed by climate change and human activities. Our specially designed glow worm cave offers optimal conditions for their well-being, mitigating environmental impacts.

Tour Highlights:

  • Hop on Hop off Bus: Begin your adventure with a scenic drive from your hotel to the Scenic Rim and Tamborine Mountain, setting the stage for an unforgettable journey.

  • Glow Worm Caves: Explore the renowned glow worm caves on Tamborine Mountain, immersing yourself in their ethereal glow and marveling at nature's wonders.

Experience the best of Tamborine Mountain's natural beauty and conservation efforts on our Daytime Scenic Rim Glow Worm Adventure, where every moment offers a glimpse into the extraordinary world of glow worms.

Pickup Locations:

Brisbane Marriott

Royal on the Park

Emporium Southbank


Tour Highlights

- Get picked up from your hotel and take a quick scenic drive out to the Scenic Rim and Tamborine Mountain

- Visit the Famous Glow Worm caves on Tamborine Mountain

- Learn about the History of Tamborine Mountain through the eyes of a local

- Time for morning tea at Restaurants, cafes and eateries

- Stop at lookouts along the way and enjoy views of the Scenic Rim

- Enjoy the Hop on Hop off bus to explore Tamborine Mountain
